analyzed: bdag nyid dran par bya ba'i phyir //

analyzed: dpa' bo rnams kyis bzod par rigs //

original: 'dir slob dpon snying rje mchog dang ldan pas sems can gyi don thugs la bzhag nas mdor bsdus pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi sku'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang gi yon tan gcig tu brjod pa'i sgo nas bstod ba sngon du 'gro ba'i phyag 'tshal ba bstan pa
analyzed: 'dir slob dpon snying rje mchog dang ldan pas sems can gyi don thugs la bzhag nas mdor bsdus pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi sku'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang gi yon tan gcig tu brjod pa'i sgo nas bstod ba sngon du 'gro ba'i phyag 'tshal ba bstan pa
translated: Here, the master, having placed the welfare of sentient beings in his heart, first of all pays homage by way of a praise that expresses in a single voice the qualities of Vajradhara, the essence of the body of truth, such as the brief and so on.

original: ni / khams gsum spyod pa las grol zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ni / khams gsum spyod pa las grol zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The praise is stated in the lines beginning ‚ÄúFreed from the activities of the three realms‚Äù and so on.

original: rgyal ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: The homage is stated in the lines beginning ‚ÄúHomage to the Victorious One‚Äôs body.‚Äù

original: zhes sbyar te khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa zhig ce na /
analyzed: zhes sbyar te khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa zhig ce na /
translated: What are the special qualities of the object of homage?

original: 'jig rten gsum ste lus dang ngag dang yid de de'i tha snyad las grol ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum ste lus dang ngag dang yid de de'i tha snyad las grol ba'o //
translated: The three worlds are body, speech, and mind, and he is freed from the conventions of those.

original: mkha' dang mnyam par gyur pa ni sgrib pa dang bral ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mkha' dang mnyam par gyur pa ni sgrib pa dang bral ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He is equal to space because he is the essence free from obscurations.

original: dngos kun ngo bo ni chos rnams don dam par na yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos kun ngo bo ni chos rnams don dam par na yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The essence of all things is that ultimately all phenomena are the essence of the limit of reality.

original: dag pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i rnyog ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dag pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i rnyog ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is pure because it is free from the turbidity of conceptual thought.

original: zhi ba ni nyon mongs pa'i me ma lus pa zhi ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhi ba ni nyon mongs pa'i me ma lus pa zhi ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is peace because it is the pacification of the fire of all afflictions.

original: rnam dben ni brtags nas stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam dben ni brtags nas stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is isolation because it is emptiness as imagined.

original: mchog zhi ba ni sems can ma lus pa la phan pa'i rgyu'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog zhi ba ni sems can ma lus pa la phan pa'i rgyu'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is supreme peace because it is the cause of the benefit of all sentient beings.

original: rnal 'byor pa nyid yul zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa nyid yul zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the domain of the yogis because it is the object of the Buddhas, which is to be known by each one for himself.

original: rtogs dka' ni de las gzhan pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs dka' ni de las gzhan pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is difficult to understand because it is not the domain of others.

original: brtag par dka' ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brtag par dka' ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is difficult to fathom because it is not the domain of body, speech, or mind.

original: bdag gzhan rab phan ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rten gyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag gzhan rab phan ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rten gyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the supreme benefit for self and other because it is the basis of the perfection of the aims of self and other.

original: khyab pa ni dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab pa ni dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is pervasive because it is the nature of all things.

original: mtshan ma med pa ni @158a * //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa ni @158a * //
translated: Signless,

original: ma skyes pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of being the nature of non-arising.

original: bde ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Bliss, because of being free from all suffering.

original: mnyam med ni de las gzhan pa'i bde bas so //
analyzed: mnyam med ni de las gzhan pa'i bde bas so //
translated: Unequaled, because of being superior to other kinds of bliss.

original: mnyam zhes bya ba ni bde ba tsam gyis rigs su byung ba'o //üîΩde'i phyir mi rtog tshul gcig la //
analyzed: mnyam zhes bya ba ni bde ba tsam gyis rigs su byung ba'o // de'i phyir mi rtog tshul gcig la //
translated: Equal, because of being the same as mere bliss.üîΩTherefore, it is said, ‚Äúnon-conceptual, of one taste.‚Äù

original: zhes bya'o // dpal ldan mnyam 'dus rgyud kyi ni //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // dpal ldan mnyam 'dus rgyud kyi ni //
translated: The glorious Guhyasamaja Tantra,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
translated: and so on.

original: mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad par bya //
analyzed: mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad par bya //
translated: I will explain in brief.

original: zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: This is how it is connected.

original: bshad pa'i rgyud dang gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud du bstan pa'i lha rnams yang dag par mdor bsdus pa ste gcig tu byas pa'i rim pa gang yin pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud dang gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud du bstan pa'i lha rnams yang dag par mdor bsdus pa ste gcig tu byas pa'i rim pa gang yin pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The stages of the deities taught in the explanatory tantra and the Guhyasamaja Tantra are summarized and made into one, which is the stage.

original: mtha' drug rtogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mtha' drug rtogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because of realizing the six limits, and so on.

original: dgongs pas bshad pa dgongs min dang // nges don drang don 'byed pa dang // ji bzhin sgra dang sgra min te //
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa dgongs min dang // nges don drang don 'byed pa dang // ji bzhin sgra dang sgra min te //

original: mtha' drug ces ni grags pa yin //
analyzed: mtha' drug ces ni grags pa yin //

original: zhes bya ba rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba rtogs pa'i phyir ro //

original: dngos grub thams cad mdor bsdus pa //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad mdor bsdus pa //
translated: All powers are summarized

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kun gyi rgyur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kun gyi rgyur gyur pa'o //

original: de ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i lugs dag pas gsang sngags kyi theg pa ni sgrub pa'i thabs bde ba nyid yin no zhes 'dul pa'i skye bo rnams spro ba skyed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i lugs dag pas gsang sngags kyi theg pa ni sgrub pa'i thabs bde ba nyid yin no zhes 'dul pa'i skye bo rnams spro ba skyed pa'i phyir /
translated: The Mantra Vehicle is superiorüîΩbecause of its absence of faults,

original: rnam rtog bag chags nyes pa'i sa //
analyzed: rnam rtog bag chags nyes pa'i sa //

original: rnam par rtog pa snga ma snga ma'i bag chags las yang dag par 'byung ba'i gzugs la sogs pa nyid ni rang gi sems las ma gtogs pa'i gzugs don dam par yod pa ma yin gyi gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo 'ba' zhig gis 'gro ba gsum
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa snga ma snga ma'i bag chags las yang dag par 'byung ba'i gzugs la sogs pa nyid ni rang gi sems las ma gtogs pa'i gzugs don dam par yod pa ma yin gyi gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo 'ba' zhig gis 'gro ba gsum
translated: The forms, etc. that arise from the latent impressions of former conceptualizations are not forms existing ultimately apart from one‚Äôs own mind, but only in the nature of grasped and grasper.

original: de'i phyir de dag la legs par bltas la rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas sbyar bar bya'o //üîΩde lta bas na 'dod pa lnga'i longs spyod yongs su spangs nas dka' thub ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag la legs par bltas la rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas sbyar bar bya'o // de lta bas na 'dod pa lnga'i longs spyod yongs su spangs nas dka' thub ste /

analyzed: dka' thub kyi spyod pa la sogs pas gdung bar mi bya'o //

original: de nas 'dir ni sdom gnas 'di //
analyzed: de nas 'dir ni sdom gnas 'di //

analyzed: dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lha mnyes par bya ba'i skabs yin pas sgra ji bzhin bshad pa ste go sla'o //

analyzed: 'jam @158b pa'i stan la 'dug nas ni //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'o //

translated: This is the samƒÅdhi:

analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'jigs byed dang mtshan mo nag mo g-yon brkyang pas mnan pa /
translated: standing on a sun ma·πá·∏çala, pressing Bhairava and K·πõi·π£·πáa KƒÅlarƒÅtri with the left leg extended.

original: phyag dang po gnyis kyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya dang rdo rje dang dril bu thugs kar 'dzin pa /
analyzed: phyag dang po gnyis kyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya dang rdo rje dang dril bu thugs kar 'dzin pa /

original: gzhan dag gis 'khor lo dang / padma dang / rin po che dang / ral gri 'dzin pa'i thugs ka'i sa bon las rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du khro bo bcu gnas ji lta ba bzhin du spro bar bya'o //

translated: From the seed syllable at the heart one should emanate the ten wrathful ones in sequence, in the same order as their abodes.

original: bgegs kun rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir gnod mdzes rgyal po spro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis yang bka' nod par bsgoms nas rdo rje tho ba dang ldan pa'i phyag gis bka' bsgo bar byed do //
analyzed: bgegs kun rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir gnod mdzes rgyal po spro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis yang bka' nod par bsgoms nas rdo rje tho ba dang ldan pa'i phyag gis bka' bsgo bar byed do //
translated: In order to destroy all obstructors, one should visualize SumbharƒÅja, who is summoned by the yoga of emanation, and who, holding a vajra hammer in his hand, gives the command.

original: zhes bya ba ni gnod mdzes rgyal po'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnod mdzes rgyal po'o //

original: bgegs kyi bdag po ni 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa dang steng 'og na gnas pa'i bgegs rnams so //
analyzed: bgegs kyi bdag po ni 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa dang steng 'og na gnas pa'i bgegs rnams so //

original: cho ga bzhin du zhes bya ba ni yang dag par bkug nas khron pa'i nang du chud par byas pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin du zhes bya ba ni yang dag par bkug nas khron pa'i nang du chud par byas pa'o //

analyzed: rdo rje me ni kun du yang //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: dngos po med pa bsgom pa'i dngos //
analyzed: dngos po med pa bsgom pa'i dngos //
translated: The reality of the meditation on unreality.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po don ma lus pa dngos po med par gyur pas bsgom pa yod pa ma yin te bsgom par bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The meditation on the reality of the animate and inanimate world as being unreal is not real, because there is nothing to be meditated on.

original: bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa med //
analyzed: bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa med //
translated: There is no meditation on what is to be meditated on.

original: ces bya ba ni gang @159a * //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni gang @159a * //
translated: This is because

original: yod pa de ni bsgom par bya ba ma yin te ma bsgoms su zin kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa de ni bsgom par bya ba ma yin te ma bsgoms su zin kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: what exists is not to be meditated on, because it exists even without being meditated on.

original: de ltar na dngos po med pa dang ldan pa de yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na dngos po med pa dang ldan pa de yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, that which possesses unreality also does not exist.

original: de bas na sgom pa po dang bsgom par bya ba dang / sgom pa dmigs su yod pa ma yin te yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: de bas na sgom pa po dang bsgom par bya ba dang / sgom pa dmigs su yod pa ma yin te yi ge'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the meditator, the meditation, and the object of meditation are not perceived. This is the meaning of the syllables.

original: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang sa la sogs pa'i chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes gang bsgom pa de ni yod pa ma yin te stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang sa la sogs pa'i chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes gang bsgom pa de ni yod pa ma yin te stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That meditation which is the meditation on the emptiness of all things such as the compounded and the uncompounded, the stages, etc. is not existent, because of the adherence to emptiness.

original: mtshan ma spang bar bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: mtshan ma spang bar bya ba'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of abandoning signs,

original: bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min //
analyzed: bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min //
translated: meditation is not meditation.

original: zhes smras te /
analyzed: zhes smras te /
translated: Thus he says.

original: gang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rnam par mngon par zhen pas bsgom pa de yang rigs pa ma yin te rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rnam par mngon par zhen pas bsgom pa de yang rigs pa ma yin te rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That meditation which is the adherence to the aspects of cause and effect is also illogical, because cause and effect are nondual.

original: smon pa dgag pa'i phyir //
analyzed: smon pa dgag pa'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of stopping aspiration, he says:

original: de bas dngos po dngos med par //üîΩzhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de bas dngos po dngos med par // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, entities are nonentities.

original: de bas de ltar na phyi rol gyi rnam pa'i smon lam gang yin pa'i 'bras bu de yang yod pa ma yin te smon lam gyis dmigs pa gang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bas de ltar na phyi rol gyi rnam pa'i smon lam gang yin pa'i 'bras bu de yang yod pa ma yin te smon lam gyis dmigs pa gang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, therefore, the effect of that aspiration to external aspects is also nonexistent, because the object of aspiration does not exist.

original: de'i phyi rol gyi rdzas kyi rnam pa bsgom pa dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba ni yod pa ma yin te sems kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyi rol gyi rdzas kyi rnam pa bsgom pa dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba ni yod pa ma yin te sems kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The meditation on the form of the substance outside of that is called ‚Äúnon-apprehended‚Äù and does not exist because it is the nature of mind.

original: spyi'i don to //
analyzed: spyi'i don to //
translated: The general meaning.

original: dngos po med pa bsgom pa'i dngos //
analyzed: dngos po med pa bsgom pa'i dngos //
translated: The reality of meditation on non-entity.

original: zhes bya ba la phung po la sogs pa de dag dngos po med pas gang bsgom par bya ba sems tsam nyid kyang med pas de'i phyir rnam par dag pa ma yin te rtag tu yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la phung po la sogs pa de dag dngos po med pas gang bsgom par bya ba sems tsam nyid kyang med pas de'i phyir rnam par dag pa ma yin te rtag tu yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since those aggregates, etc. are non-entities, the meditation on them is also non-existent, being only mind. Therefore, it is not pure because it is not always existent.

original: kun rdzob kyi bden pa gsal bar 'dod pas /üîΩbsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min //
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi bden pa gsal bar 'dod pas / bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min //
translated: Desiring to clarify the conventional truth,

original: zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThe meditation on what is to be meditated on is not meditation.‚Äù

original: gang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid can sgyur lta bu'i lha'i gzugs bsgom pa de yang rigs pa ma yin te 'od gsal bas rnam par dag par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid can sgyur lta bu'i lha'i gzugs bsgom pa de yang rigs pa ma yin te 'od gsal bas rnam par dag par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Whatever meditation on the form of a deity that is like an illusion, which has the nature of the conventional truth, is not reasonable because it is purified by clear light.

original: de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i rang bzhin gyi dngos po ni yod pa ma yin te bden pa gnyis gnyis su med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i rang bzhin gyi dngos po ni yod pa ma yin te bden pa gnyis gnyis su med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, the thing that is the nature of conventional truth does not exist, because the two truths are nondual.

original: de'i phyir bsgom pa ste bden pa gnyis su med pa'i rnam pa can dmigs su med pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bsgom pa ste bden pa gnyis su med pa'i rnam pa can dmigs su med pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the meditation that has the aspect of the nonduality of the two truths is not an object of perception.

original: dka' bas dmigs par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: dka' bas dmigs par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: It is difficult to perceive up to the end.

original: sbas pa'o // don dam pa'i bden pa'i dngos po med pas bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa ma yin te gdod ma nas dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sbas pa'o // don dam pa'i bden pa'i dngos po med pas bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa ma yin te gdod ma nas dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is hidden. Since the thing that is ultimate truth does not exist, the meditation that is to be meditated upon is not a meditation, because it is pure from the beginning.

original: gang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid can gyi bsgom pa de yang bsgom pa ma yin te bden pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid can gyi bsgom pa de yang bsgom pa ma yin te bden pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Also, that meditation which has the nature of conventional truth is not a meditation, because it is true.

original: rnam pa 'di dag gis ni bden pa gnyis kyi bdag @159b nyid can gyi bsgom pa gang yin pa de yang bsgom par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa 'di dag gis ni bden pa gnyis kyi bdag @159b nyid can gyi bsgom pa gang yin pa de yang bsgom par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: By these aspects, that meditation which has the nature of the two truths is also not an object of meditation,

original: bden pa gnyis su med par mthong ba tsam gyi thar pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis su med par mthong ba tsam gyi thar pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because liberation is merely the vision of the nonduality of the two truths.

original: des ni sgom pa po dang bsgom pa dang bsgom par bya ba de dag tu mngon par zhen pa ni zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par dmigs su med pa'o zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin par rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa yin no
analyzed: des ni sgom pa po dang bsgom pa dang bsgom par bya ba de dag tu mngon par zhen pa ni zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par dmigs su med pa'o zhes bya ba yod pa ma yin par rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa yin no
translated: Thus, Vajradhara has said that the non-existence of the meditator, meditation, and the object of meditation is the non-apprehension of the realization of the samƒÅdhi of union.

original: // mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: // mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The ultimate.

original: tshigs bcad 'di yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rgyu mi rgyu'i bdag nyid can ni sgom pa po'o //
analyzed: tshigs bcad 'di yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rgyu mi rgyu'i bdag nyid can ni sgom pa po'o //
translated: The one with the nature of the moving and unmoving is the meditator.

original: ye shes kyi byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir h'um gnyis sa bon yam las 'byung zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ye shes kyi byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir h'um gnyis sa bon yam las 'byung zhes bya ba la /
translated: For the consecration of wisdom, two h≈´·πÉs arise from the seed yams.

original: gzhu'i rnam pa lta bu mdog sngo ba'o //
analyzed: gzhu'i rnam pa lta bu mdog sngo ba'o //
translated: The bow-shaped one is blue.

original: me'i dkyil 'khor ni gru gsum mdog dmar po'o //üîΩchu'i dkyil 'khor ni zlum po kha dog dkar po'o //
analyzed: me'i dkyil 'khor ni gru gsum mdog dmar po'o // chu'i dkyil 'khor ni zlum po kha dog dkar po'o //
translated: The fire ma·πá·∏çala is a red triangle.üîΩThe water ma·πá·∏çala is a white circle.

original: sa'i dkyil 'khor ni gru bzhi mdog ser po'o //
analyzed: sa'i dkyil 'khor ni gru bzhi mdog ser po'o //
translated: The earth ma·πá·∏çala is a yellow square.

original: de'i steng du yi ge h'um dkar po bsgoms la dkyil 'khor bzhi dang / brum bsdus pa las gzhal yas khang bsgom par bya ba yin pas /
analyzed: de'i steng du yi ge h'um dkar po bsgoms la dkyil 'khor bzhi dang / brum bsdus pa las gzhal yas khang bsgom par bya ba yin pas /
translated: On top of that, one should meditate on the white letter h≈´·πÉ, and meditate on the celestial mansion from the gathering of bhr≈´·πÉ.

original: zur bzhi dang ni sgo bzhi dang / zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /üîΩthig bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: zur bzhi dang ni sgo bzhi dang / zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / thig bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan //
translated: Therefore, it says, ‚Äúwith four corners and four doors,‚Äù and so on.üîΩ‚ÄúEndowed with four lines‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni zur bzhi mnyam par bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zur bzhi mnyam par bya ba'o //
translated: means that the four corners are equal.

original: rdo rje nor bu zla phyed brgyan //
analyzed: rdo rje nor bu zla phyed brgyan //
translated: ‚ÄúAdorned with vajra jewels and half-moons‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang nor bu dang zla ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pas brgyan pa //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang nor bu dang zla ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pas brgyan pa //
translated: means that it is adorned with vajras, jewels, moons, half-moons, nets, and half-nets.

original: sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su ;
analyzed: sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su ;
translated: ‚ÄúIn the corners of the doors and door surrounds‚Äù

original: / zhes bya ba ni sgo'i mtshams kyi zur ro //
analyzed: / zhes bya ba ni sgo'i mtshams kyi zur ro //
translated: refers to the corners of the door surrounds.

original: bum pa dang ka ba snye bar mdzes par byas pa'o //
analyzed: bum pa dang ka ba snye bar mdzes par byas pa'o //
translated: It is beautified with vases and pillars.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du gzhal yas khang ngo //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du gzhal yas khang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúVajra‚Äù means the celestial mansion on top of the crossed vajra.

original: bre yi phreng ni bya yis mdzes //
analyzed: bre yi phreng ni bya yis mdzes //
translated: ‚ÄúA garland of birds beautifies the eaves.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni bya'i tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bya'i tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is beautified by a flock of birds.

original: de lta bu'i tshogs gzhal yas khang rnam par bsams la /
analyzed: de lta bu'i tshogs gzhal yas khang rnam par bsams la /
translated: Having visualized such a celestial mansion,

original: yud tsam gyi bdag nyid can du 'chad par 'gyur ba'i brten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus pa dang bcas par zhal gsum phyag drug par aindra n'i la'i 'od dang mnyam pa nyid dang mtshungs pa'i shes rab kyis 'khyud pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: yud tsam gyi bdag nyid can du 'chad par 'gyur ba'i brten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus pa dang bcas par zhal gsum phyag drug par aindra n'i la'i 'od dang mnyam pa nyid dang mtshungs pa'i shes rab kyis 'khyud pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on the entire wheel of the supporting mandala, with the nature of a mere instant, as having three faces and six arms, embraced by Praj√±ƒÅ, who is similar to the light of sapphire.üîΩHaving visualized such an imagination,

original: de ltar lhag par mos par bsams nas zhes bya ba ni lhag par mos pa tsam gyis yin gyi /
analyzed: de ltar lhag par mos par bsams nas zhes bya ba ni lhag par mos pa tsam gyis yin gyi /
translated: by mere imagination,

original: phyag mtshan dang sa bon la sogs pa yongs su gyur pa las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phyag mtshan dang sa bon la sogs pa yongs su gyur pa las ni ma yin no //
translated: not by the transformation of the hand implements, seed syllables, and so on.

original: de lta bu'i lhag par mos pa'i dkyil 'khor yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i lhag par mos pa'i dkyil 'khor yin no //
translated: Such is the mandala of imagination.

original: cho ga ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni phyag dang mdog dang phyag mtshan la sogs pas mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: cho ga ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni phyag dang mdog dang phyag mtshan la sogs pas mdzes pa'o //
translated: As for ‚Äújust as in the rite,‚Äù it is beautified by the hand implements, colors, and so on.

original: slar yang kha sbyor sbyor ba yis /
analyzed: slar yang kha sbyor sbyor ba yis /
translated: Again, through the yoga of union,

original: @160a * // zhes bya ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba'i ros so //
analyzed: @160a * // zhes bya ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba'i ros so //
translated: By the taste of the bliss of meditative concentration.

original: rim pa ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni gang dang gang gi bdag nyid can yin pa'i rigs kyi gnas de re re nye bar bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rim pa ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni gang dang gang gi bdag nyid can yin pa'i rigs kyi gnas de re re nye bar bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
translated: In due order, means that one should imagine that each of the families, which are of such and such a nature, is present.

original: don dam pa yi 'khor lo yis //
analyzed: don dam pa yi 'khor lo yis //
translated: By the wheel of the ultimate,

original: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid du 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid du 'jug par bya'o //
translated: means that one should enter into the nature of great bliss.

original: bsad nas zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs par bya ba ni bsad pa'i don to //
analyzed: bsad nas zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs par bya ba ni bsad pa'i don to //
translated: Having killed, means that the object of killing is to make it non-apprehensible.

original: de ltar byas pa la yon tan ci yod ce na /
analyzed: de ltar byas pa la yon tan ci yod ce na /
translated: What is the good of doing it that way?

original: sgrub pa pos dngos grub rab mchog ste /
analyzed: sgrub pa pos dngos grub rab mchog ste /
translated: The adept will have the best success,

original: shin tu myur bar dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: shin tu myur bar dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: means that one will very quickly attain success.üîΩThe realization of the aggregate of form is the mirror,

original: gzugs phung rtogs pa me long zhes bya ba la rnam par snang mdzad dang sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs phung rtogs pa me long zhes bya ba la rnam par snang mdzad dang sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa'o //
translated: means that Vairocana, BuddhalocanƒÅ, and so forth are the mirror-like pristine awareness.

original: me long zhes bya ba ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
analyzed: me long zhes bya ba ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
translated: The mirror is the mirror-like pristine awareness.

original: sa'i khams ni sa'i khams so //
analyzed: sa'i khams ni sa'i khams so //
translated: The earth element is the earth element.

original: mig gi dbang po ni mig go //
analyzed: mig gi dbang po ni mig go //
translated: The eye faculty is the eye.

original: gzugs kyang zhes bya ba ni mig gis gzung bar bya ba'i tshogs so //üîΩkhro bo zhes bya ba ni gshin rje gshed dang 'dod pa'i rgyal bo'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyang zhes bya ba ni mig gis gzung bar bya ba'i tshogs so // khro bo zhes bya ba ni gshin rje gshed dang 'dod pa'i rgyal bo'o //
translated: Form is the aggregate of form, which is the collection of objects apprehended by the eye.üîΩThe two wrathful ones are Yamantaka and Kamadeva.

original: byams pa zhes bya ba ni sa'i snying po dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: byams pa zhes bya ba ni sa'i snying po dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Love is Kshitigarbha and his retinue.

original: tshor ba'i phung po ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
analyzed: tshor ba'i phung po ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
translated: The aggregate of feeling is Ratnasambhava.

original: mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: Equality is the wisdom of equality.

original: khro bo gnyis zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang dbyug sngon can no //
analyzed: khro bo gnyis zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang dbyug sngon can no //
translated: The two wrathful ones are Aparajita and Niladanda.

original: 'du shes kyi phung po ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi phung po ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: The aggregate of perception is Amitabha.

original: so sor rtog pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //üîΩbyin za ni me'o //
analyzed: so sor rtog pa ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so // byin za ni me'o //
translated: Discernment is the wisdom of discernment.

original: khro bo gnyis ni padma mthar byed dang stobs po che'o //
analyzed: khro bo gnyis ni padma mthar byed dang stobs po che'o //
translated: The two wrathful ones are Mahabala and Padmanarteshvara.

original: 'du byed ni don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed ni don yod grub pa'o //
translated: The aggregate of formation is Amoghasiddhi.

original: bya ba grub pa ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: bya ba grub pa ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Accomplishment is the wisdom of accomplishment.

original: khro bo gnyis ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang mi g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: khro bo gnyis ni bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang mi g-yo ba'o //
translated: The two wrathful ones are Amrtakundali and Achala.

original: steng 'og khro bo gnyid dang bcas //
analyzed: steng 'og khro bo gnyid dang bcas //
translated: The upper and lower wrathful ones are asleep.

original: zhes bya ba ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang gnod mdzes rgyal po dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang gnod mdzes rgyal po dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: This is the union with the u·π£·πáƒ´·π£a Cakravartin and the king Sumbha.

original: rang bzhin gyis ni snang ba nyid //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni snang ba nyid //
translated: The natural luminosity.

original: ces bya ba ni rnam par shes pa gsum dang 'brel pa'i rang bzhin brgyad cu'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rnam par shes pa gsum dang 'brel pa'i rang bzhin brgyad cu'o //
translated: This is the eighty natures associated with the three consciousnesses.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni me bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni me bskyod pa'o //
translated: The aggregate of consciousness is Ak·π£obhya.

original: de yang 'od gsal bar gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang 'od gsal bar gzhug par bya'o //
translated: And that should be introduced into luminosity.

original: mya ngan 'das bcas kun stong dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la chos kyi sku ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das bcas kun stong dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la chos kyi sku ni chos rnams kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The emptiness of all things, including nirvƒÅ·πáa, and so on.

original: da ni sku'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ldang ba bstan pa ni /üîΩsngags kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bstan te /
analyzed: da ni sku'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ldang ba bstan pa ni / sngags kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bstan te /
translated: Now, in order to complete the body ma·πá·∏çala, the arising is taught:üîΩThe mantra body is complete through union.

original: sngags la yongs su rdzogs pa ni sngags kyi sku'o //
analyzed: sngags la yongs su rdzogs pa ni sngags kyi sku'o //
translated: The mantra body is the completion of the mantra.

original: sbyor ba yis zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sbyor ba yis zhes bya ba la /
translated: Through union.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus @160b gnas par //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus @160b gnas par //
translated: In the center of the realm of space,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Thus, etc.

original: gzhal yas khang gi nang gi nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus so //
analyzed: gzhal yas khang gi nang gi nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus so //
translated: In the middle of the realm of space inside the celestial mansion,

original: dbyangs kyi yi ge aa las gyur pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor thabs kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo dang aom gyi yi ge las byung ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shes rab kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi yi ge aa las gyur pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor thabs kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo dang aom gyi yi ge las byung ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shes rab kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on the sun mandala arisen from the vowel A, which is the essence of the wisdom of means, and the moon mandala arisen from the syllable Om, which is the nature of the wisdom of insight.

original: padma 'dab ma brgyad ces bya ba ni ma las byung ba nyid do //

translated: If you wish, please enjoy the play of praising me.

original: gzhan yang m'a ma k'i sa bskul bar bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan yang m'a ma k'i sa bskul bar bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, in order to show the urging of MƒÅmakƒ´,

original: rdo rje sku khyod ces bya ba la sogs pa smras te nyams pa med @166b pa'i sku yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje sku khyod ces bya ba la sogs pa smras te nyams pa med @166b pa'i sku yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: he says, ‚ÄúO Vajra Body,‚Äù and so forth. Since it is the body of non-degeneration,

original: bka' yi 'khor los sems can kun la phan //
analyzed: bka' yi 'khor los sems can kun la phan //
translated: the wheel of speech benefits all sentient beings.

original: zhes bya ba ni bka'i 'khor lo gang la sems can kun la don yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bka'i 'khor lo gang la sems can kun la don yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is the wheel of the word, because it is meaningful for all sentient beings.

original: sangs rgyas ni phung po lnga'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni phung po lnga'o //
translated: The Buddha is the five aggregates.

original: de dag gi don ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi don ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
translated: Their meaning is the conventional truth.

original: byang chub ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: Enlightenment is the ultimate truth.

original: de dag sbyar ba las byung ba'i gzugs ni mdog ces bya'o //
analyzed: de dag sbyar ba las byung ba'i gzugs ni mdog ces bya'o //
translated: The form that arises from their union is called color.

original: de sems can la phan pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis rab tu ston pa ni rab tu phan par gzigs so //
analyzed: de sems can la phan pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis rab tu ston pa ni rab tu phan par gzigs so //
translated: He shows it to sentient beings out of the intention to benefit them, and he sees it as extremely beneficial.

original: 'dod chags zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags rnams par sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags rnams par sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Attachment is for the sake of purifying attachments.

original: dam tshig chags pa ni 'dod chags kyi spyod pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: dam tshig chags pa ni 'dod chags kyi spyod pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: Attachment to the pledge is the very nature of the practice of attachment.

original: bdag la dgyes pas zhes bya ba bdag la rol mo mdzod cig pa'o //
analyzed: bdag la dgyes pas zhes bya ba bdag la rol mo mdzod cig pa'o //
translated: Pleased with me, means please enjoy yourself with me.

original: khyod ni rdo rje gsung ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gsung gi dbang phyug nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyod ni rdo rje gsung ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gsung gi dbang phyug nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: You are the vajra speech, etc. , is because of attaining the state of the lord of speech.

original: phan zhing thugs brtse ba ni sems can gyi khams ma lus pa la'o //
analyzed: phan zhing thugs brtse ba ni sems can gyi khams ma lus pa la'o //
translated: Beneficial and compassionate means to the entire realm of sentient beings.

original: sems can gyi dgongs pa nyid don de mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi dgongs pa nyid don de mdzad pa'o //
translated: The purpose is the very purpose of sentient beings.

original: rtag tu dus thams cad du 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu dus thams cad du 'jug pa'o //
translated: It is always at all times.

original: bdag la dgyes par mdzod cig ces bya ba ni 'dod pa'i spyod pa'o //
analyzed: bdag la dgyes par mdzod cig ces bya ba ni 'dod pa'i spyod pa'o //
translated: The phrase be pleased with me is the conduct of desire.

original: kun ni sems can gyi khams so //
analyzed: kun ni sems can gyi khams so //
translated: The all is the realm of sentient beings.

original: bzang po ni dge ba'o //
analyzed: bzang po ni dge ba'o //
translated: The good is virtue.

original: de byed pas ni kun du bzang po'o //
analyzed: de byed pas ni kun du bzang po'o //
translated: Because he performs that, he is Samantabhadra.

original: khyod ni rdo rje'i sku ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje zhes bya ba ni mi phyed pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: khyod ni rdo rje'i sku ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje zhes bya ba ni mi phyed pa'i sku'o //
translated: The phrase you are the vajra body and so on. The vajra is the indivisible body.

original: las kyi rigs kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir dam tshig mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: las kyi rigs kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir dam tshig mchog ces bya'o //
translated: He is called supreme commitment because he is the lord of the karma family.

original: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir phan don che'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir phan don che'o //
translated: He is greatly beneficial because he is the cause of benefit for all sentient beings.

original: sh'akya'i rigs su 'byung pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sh'akya'i rigs su 'byung pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir /
translated: He is called supreme of the Shakyas because he is supreme among those who appear in the Shakyas.

original: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog ces bya'o //
translated: He is called supreme heir of the perfect Buddha because he is the supreme heir of the perfect Buddha.

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi cha la dmigs pa dang bral ba nyid yin na yang sems can rnams la mnyam pa nyid du gzigs pa nyid do //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi cha la dmigs pa dang bral ba nyid yin na yang sems can rnams la mnyam pa nyid du gzigs pa nyid do //
translated: Although free from the reference to the part of self and other, it is the very vision of equality in sentient beings.üîΩThe treasure of many precious qualities,

original: yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag / ces bya ba ni chags pa dang chags pa dang bral ba dang / chags pa bar ma dang 'od gsal ba skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag / ces bya ba ni chags pa dang chags pa dang bral ba dang / chags pa bar ma dang 'od gsal ba skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: is the generator of attachment, freedom from attachment, and middling attachment.

original: de ltar yang dag yon tan ni //
analyzed: de ltar yang dag yon tan ni //
translated: Thus, the true qualities,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: mgon po zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'o //
analyzed: mgon po zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'o //
translated: The Lord is the principal of the mandala.

original: yang dag yon tan ni brjod pas zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag yon tan ni brjod pas zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'o //
translated: The true qualities are the expression, as previously taught.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor pa'o //
translated: The Tathagata is the mandala retinue.üîΩAkshobhya, etc.

original: mi bskyod pa la sogs zhes bya ba la nyon mongs pa'i bkod pa thams cad kyis mi g-yo bas na mi bskyod pa'o //üîΩgang gi thugs rdo rje @167a * //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa la sogs zhes bya ba la nyon mongs pa'i bkod pa thams cad kyis mi g-yo bas na mi bskyod pa'o // gang gi thugs rdo rje @167a * //
translated: Since he is unmoved by all the arrays of afflictions, he is Akshobhya.

original: yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Whose mind is vajra, he is so called.

original: stong pa bzhi'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ye shes che'o //
analyzed: stong pa bzhi'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ye shes che'o //
translated: It is great intuition because it is the nature of the four emptinesses.

original: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin par mdzad pas na rdo rje dbyings so //
analyzed: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin par mdzad pas na rdo rje dbyings so //
translated: The vajra realm is the vajra realm of all the Tathagatas, because it is the cause of their concentration.

original: bden pa gnyis rnam par dbye ba yongs su shes pas mkhas chen po'o //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis rnam par dbye ba yongs su shes pas mkhas chen po'o //
translated: It is the great scholar because it is the knowledge of the distinction between the two truths.

original: don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / sku'i dkyil 'khor dang / 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gsum mo //
analyzed: don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / sku'i dkyil 'khor dang / 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gsum mo //
translated: It is the three mandalas because it is the nature of the ultimate mandala, the body mandala, and the emanation mandala.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir rdo rje mchog go //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir rdo rje mchog go //
translated: It is the supreme vajra because it is the supreme of the vajras of body, speech, and mind.

original: gsang ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi de kho na nyid bdag la rab tu ston cig pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi de kho na nyid bdag la rab tu ston cig pa'o //
translated: The secret melody is the teaching of the reality of the commitments to oneself.

original: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Vairochana, etc.

original: 'od gsal pa'i mes gsal bar gyur pas na rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: 'od gsal pa'i mes gsal bar gyur pas na rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: Vairochana is the one who illuminates with the light of clear light.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rab tu dga' ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rab tu dga' ba'o //
translated: It is the Joyful because of that.

original: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: The vajra is the Tathagatas.

original: de rnams dag pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir zhe ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams dag pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir zhe ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Since they are the nature of purity, they are called ‚Äúpure.‚Äù

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir dga' ba ma zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir dga' ba ma zhes bya'o //
translated: Since they are the nature of supreme joy, they are called ‚Äújoyful.‚Äù

original: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba yin zhing dag pa'i chos ston pa ste rab tu ston pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba yin zhing dag pa'i chos ston pa ste rab tu ston pa'o //
translated: They are the natural luminosity, the teaching of the pure Dharma, the teaching.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
translated: Vajra is the teaching.

original: rin chen ni rin po che'i rigs so //
analyzed: rin chen ni rin po che'i rigs so //
translated: Jewel is the jewel lineage.

original: de dag gi rgyal por gyur cing gsal bar byed pa yin pas na rin chen rgyal po'o //
analyzed: de dag gi rgyal por gyur cing gsal bar byed pa yin pas na rin chen rgyal po'o //
translated: Since they are the king of those and the illuminator, they are the jewel king.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir rab tu zab ces bya'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir rab tu zab ces bya'o //
translated: Since they are the nature of the wisdom of equality, they are called ‚Äúvery profound.‚Äù

original: de nyid kyi phyir rdo rje nam mkha' dri med ces bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rdo rje nam mkha' dri med ces bya'o //
translated: For that very reason, they are the vajra stainless space.

original: gdod ma nas dag pa'i phyir dngos nyid dag pa'o //
analyzed: gdod ma nas dag pa'i phyir dngos nyid dag pa'o //
translated: Since they are pure from the beginning, they are pure by nature.

original: chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyir gos pa med pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyir gos pa med pa'o //
translated: Since all phenomena are stainless, they are unsoiled.

original: gsang ba'i gsung ni ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i gsung ni ston par byed pa'o //
translated: The secret speech is the teaching.

original: rdo rje mi 'chi 'dod chags che //
analyzed: rdo rje mi 'chi 'dod chags che //
translated: The vajra immortal, great passion,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: rdo rje mi 'chi ba ni padma'i rigs can rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje mi 'chi ba ni padma'i rigs can rnams so //
translated: The vajra immortal are those belonging to the lotus family.

original: de rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa ni rgyal po che'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa ni rgyal po che'o //
translated: The great king is the lord of them.

original: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir mi rtog ces bya'o //
analyzed: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir mi rtog ces bya'o //
translated: He is called nonconceptual because he is the essence of the wisdom of discernment.

original: 'dod chags ni 'khor ba la chags pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: 'dod chags ni 'khor ba la chags pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: Passion is characterized by attachment to cyclic existence.

original: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i blo gang la yod pa de ni brnyes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i blo gang la yod pa de ni brnyes pa'o //
translated: He who has attained the perfection of that is called the one who has attained passion.

original: rdo rje dag pa gdon mi za //
analyzed: rdo rje dag pa gdon mi za //
translated: The vajra pure, the undeceiving,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: gdon mi za ni don yod grub pa'i rigs can rnams so //
analyzed: gdon mi za ni don yod grub pa'i rigs can rnams so //
translated: The undeceiving are those belonging to the Amoghasiddhi family.

original: de rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa ni rdo rje'o //üîΩzhi ba la sogs pa'i las bsams pa rnams rdzogs par byed par byas pas @167b na ;
analyzed: de rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa ni rdo rje'o // zhi ba la sogs pa'i las bsams pa rnams rdzogs par byed par byas pas @167b na ;
translated: Their perfect complete enlightenment is the vajra.

original: bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: He is called the one who fulfills all wishes because he causes the accomplishment of the intended actions of pacifying and so on.

original: 'od gsal ba las yang dag par byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'od gsal ba las yang dag par byung ba'i phyir /
translated: because it arises from the clear light.

original: dag pa'i ngo bo nyid las byung //
analyzed: dag pa'i ngo bo nyid las byung //
translated: It arises from the essence of purity.

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /
translated: Thus.

original: kye'i rdo rje sems dpa' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: kye'i rdo rje sems dpa' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Homage to you, O Vajra-Being!üîΩThen,

original: de nas / 'khor lo sangs rgyas kyis bstod gsol //
analyzed: de nas / 'khor lo sangs rgyas kyis bstod gsol //
translated: the wheel is praised by the Buddhas.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Thus.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bos phyag byas pas rjes thogs su lha mo'i 'khor lo 'phro bas rjes su chags par gyur pas gsang ba'i don bshad ces bya ba ni dkyil 'khor pa la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bos phyag byas pas rjes thogs su lha mo'i 'khor lo 'phro bas rjes su chags par gyur pas gsang ba'i don bshad ces bya ba ni dkyil 'khor pa la'o //
translated: By making homage with the essence of the five Buddhas, immediately after the wheel of goddesses radiates, and by becoming passionate, the secret meaning is explained, to the mandala.

original: ji bzhin mchog tu zhes bya ba ni kun kyang 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji bzhin mchog tu zhes bya ba ni kun kyang 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Just as it is, supremely, because all of them have the nature of clear light.

original: rang gi sku yi 'khor lo gzhug /
analyzed: rang gi sku yi 'khor lo gzhug /
translated: One should enter one's own body-mandala.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Thus.

original: sku'i dkyil 'khor la snga ma bzhin du zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: sku'i dkyil 'khor la snga ma bzhin du zhugs pa'o //
translated: One should enter the body-mandala, as before.

original: bden pa chen po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: bden pa chen po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: The great truth is Vajradhara.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Thus.

original: rnal 'byor bzhi med ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor dang shin tu rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor chen po byed ces bya ba ste legs par bslabs pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bzhi med ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor dang shin tu rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor chen po byed ces bya ba ste legs par bslabs pa nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúWithout the four yogas‚Äù means without the yoga, the great yoga, and so on, which are well-known.

original: h'um gi snying por zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um snying gar bsam pa'o //
analyzed: h'um gi snying por zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um snying gar bsam pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWith the essence of h≈´·πÉ‚Äù means imagining the syllable h≈´·πÉ at the heart.

original: de byung rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni de yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su'o //
analyzed: de byung rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni de yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su'o //
translated: ‚ÄúArisen from that vajra being‚Äù means arisen from the transformation of that, in the form of Vajrasattva.

original: de blos zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba rnams la rdo rje sems dpa'i blo bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de blos zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba rnams la rdo rje sems dpa'i blo bskyed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWith that mind‚Äù means generating the mind of Vajrasattva in beings.

original: sngags pas ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i tshe zhes bya ba rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa'i dus su'o //
analyzed: sngags pas ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i tshe zhes bya ba rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa'i dus su'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe mantra practitioner, when in samƒÅdhi‚Äù means at the time of uninterrupted activity.

original: lus ni bskams par 'gyur zhes bya ba lus yongs su bskams par gyur nas so //
analyzed: lus ni bskams par 'gyur zhes bya ba lus yongs su bskams par gyur nas so //
translated: ‚ÄúThe body will dry up‚Äù means that after the body has dried up completely,

original: sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: it is the samƒÅdhi called ‚Äúunion.‚Äù

original: tshim byed pa zhes bya ba ni rgyas par byed pa'o //
analyzed: tshim byed pa zhes bya ba ni rgyas par byed pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSatisfying‚Äù means expanding.

original: mtho gang tsam zhes bya ba la sogs pa la skyil 'khor brtag par bya zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mtho gang tsam zhes bya ba la sogs pa la skyil 'khor brtag par bya zhes bya ba ste /
translated: One should imagine the mandala means one should imagine the mandala of the body of the Tathagata.

original: aa las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya ba ste sgom pa'o //üîΩaom ni de ru brtag par bya //
analyzed: aa las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya ba ste sgom pa'o // aom ni de ru brtag par bya //
translated: One should visualize the moon disk arisen from the syllable A, that is, one should meditate on it.üîΩOne should visualize the syllable Om there, that is, one should meditate on the white syllable Om, facing downward in the middle of the moon disk.

original: zhes bya ba ni yi ge aom kha dog dkar po de'i dbus su kha thur du bltas pa las kha ba ltar bsil ba'i bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'i rgyun 'bebs pa'i de'i rim gyis bdag gi lus tshim par gyur par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yi ge aom kha dog dkar po de'i dbus su kha thur du bltas pa las kha ba ltar bsil ba'i bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'i rgyun 'bebs pa'i de'i rim gyis bdag gi lus tshim par gyur par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate that one's body is satisfied by the stream of the five ambrosias, cool like snow, falling from it.

original: rdo rje sbyor ba de yis ni //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa la /üîΩrdo rje'i sbyor ba ni sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin no //üîΩgzi can zhes bya ba ni stobs dang kha dog dang ldan pas bkres pa dang skom pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sbyor ba de yis ni // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / rdo rje'i sbyor ba ni sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin no // gzi can zhes bya ba ni stobs dang kha dog dang ldan pas bkres pa dang skom pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: By that vajra yoga, that is, by the Buddha samƒÅdhi,
