translated: In that way, what do those ten winds such as the life-force do, abiding in the bodies of sentient beings with a definite color?

original: ci thams cad rdo rje bzlas pa'i skabs su smra bar bya ba yin nam zhes phyogs snga ma dogs pas de'i phyir 'di dag gi las gzhan nas drangs @169b nas bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: ci thams cad rdo rje bzlas pa'i skabs su smra bar bya ba yin nam zhes phyogs snga ma dogs pas de'i phyir 'di dag gi las gzhan nas drangs @169b nas bri bar bya'o //
translated: Since this is a doubt of the opponent, he says that their functions should be drawn from other sources and written down.

original: de la rlung lnga ni lus kyi chal gnas nas lus kyi bya ba rnams byed do //
analyzed: de la rlung lnga ni lus kyi chal gnas nas lus kyi bya ba rnams byed do //
translated: The five winds are located in the body and perform the functions of the body.

original: rlung lnga ni mig la sogs pa'i skye mchad la gnas nas dbang po rnams kyi bya ba byed do //
analyzed: rlung lnga ni mig la sogs pa'i skye mchad la gnas nas dbang po rnams kyi bya ba byed do //
translated: The five winds are located in the sense bases such as the eyes and perform the functions of the sense organs.

original: srog ni snying gnag na te /
analyzed: srog ni snying gnag na te /
translated: The life-force wind is located in the heart.

original: mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: It is the essence of Akshobhya.üîΩThe downward-voiding wind is located in the genitals.

original: thur du sel ba ni mdoms na gnas pa ste rin chan 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: thur du sel ba ni mdoms na gnas pa ste rin chan 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: It is the essence of Ratnasambhava.

original: gyen du rgyu ba ni mgrin pa la gnas pa ste /
analyzed: gyen du rgyu ba ni mgrin pa la gnas pa ste /
translated: The upward-moving wind is located in the throat.

original: snang ba mtha' yas kyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: snang ba mtha' yas kyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: It is the essence of Amitabha.

original: mnyam par gnas pa ni lte ba na gnas pa ste /
analyzed: mnyam par gnas pa ni lte ba na gnas pa ste /
translated: The evenly-placed wind is located in the navel.

original: don yod grub pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: don yod grub pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: It is the essence of Amoghasiddhi.

original: khyab par gnas pa ni lus kun gyi tshigs la gnas pa ste /
analyzed: khyab par gnas pa ni lus kun gyi tshigs la gnas pa ste /
translated: The pervading wind is located in all the joints of the body.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: They are the essence of Vairocana.

original: rgyu ba ni gzugs so //üîΩrnam par rgyu ba ni sgra'o //üîΩmnyam par rgyu ba ni dri'o //
analyzed: rgyu ba ni gzugs so // rnam par rgyu ba ni sgra'o // mnyam par rgyu ba ni dri'o //
translated: Movement is form.üîΩMoving about is sound.üîΩEven movement is smell.

original: rab tu rgyu ba ni ro'o //
analyzed: rab tu rgyu ba ni ro'o //
translated: Moving well is taste.

original: nges par rgyu ba ni reg go //
analyzed: nges par rgyu ba ni reg go //
translated: Moving definitely is touch.

original: rlung bcu po de dag kyang dbugs dbyung ba dang rngub par gyur nas /
analyzed: rlung bcu po de dag kyang dbugs dbyung ba dang rngub par gyur nas /
translated: Those ten winds, having become exhalation and inhalation,

original: rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi dang / lha mo bzhi'i ngo bor yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi dang / lha mo bzhi'i ngo bor yang 'gyur ro //
translated: become the essence of the four goddesses such as VƒÅyu and the four ma·πá·∏çalas such as air.

original: de bzhin du 'byung ba lnga'i ngo bos sangs rgyas lnga'i bdag nyid du yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'byung ba lnga'i ngo bos sangs rgyas lnga'i bdag nyid du yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Likewise, by the essence of the five elements, they become the nature of the five buddhas.

original: yang yi ge gsum gyi ngo bor gyur nas 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang ba'i rim gyis rdo rje bzlas pa'i byed par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang yi ge gsum gyi ngo bor gyur nas 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang ba'i rim gyis rdo rje bzlas pa'i byed par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Again, having become the essence of the three syllables, they become the agent of vajra repetition through the process of entering, abiding, and rising.

original: yang de dag yi ge aa bzhi'i ngo bor gyur nas ngag gi brjod pa ma lus par 'byung bar byed do //
analyzed: yang de dag yi ge aa bzhi'i ngo bor gyur nas ngag gi brjod pa ma lus par 'byung bar byed do //
translated: Again, having become the essence of the four a syllables, they cause the arising of all verbal expressions.

original: yang de dag mi shigs pa thob nas dngos po med par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang de dag mi shigs pa thob nas dngos po med par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Again, having attained indestructibility, they become non-entity.

original: rgyu de'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyu de'i phyir /
translated: For that reason,

original: rlung gi de nyid rim gyis ni //
analyzed: rlung gi de nyid rim gyis ni //
translated: the reality of wind is taught first,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: and so on.

original: rlung gi de nyid dang por bstan pas na rim gyis ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rlung gi de nyid dang por bstan pas na rim gyis ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Since the reality of wind is taught first, it is said ‚Äúgradually.‚Äù

original: rlung gi de nyid la goms pa sngon du song ba nyid kyis sngags kyi de nyid ces bya ba dag rnam par dag pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: rlung gi de nyid la goms pa sngon du song ba nyid kyis sngags kyi de nyid ces bya ba dag rnam par dag pa'i tshig go //
translated: By having previously become familiar with the reality of wind, the reality of mantra is purified.

original: yang dag 'jug ces bya bar ba tu 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag 'jug ces bya bar ba tu 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚ÄúCorrect engagement‚Äù means that one will enter.

original: sngags kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sngags kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With regard to ‚Äúmantra‚Äù and so on,

original: sngags kyi don gyi mthar thug ba ni sngags kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi don gyi mthar thug ba ni sngags kyi nges pa'o //
translated: the final meaning of mantra is the ascertainment of mantra.

original: de rtogs nas rdo rje bzlas pa la legs par slob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rtogs nas rdo rje bzlas pa la legs par slob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having realized that, one will train well in vajra repetition.

original: rdo rje bzlas nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rdo rje bzlas nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Having attained the state of vajra repetition,

original: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas par gyur nas sems la dmigs pa zhes bya ba mthar thug pa phyin pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de la gnas par gyur nas sems la dmigs pa zhes bya ba mthar thug pa phyin pa ste /
translated: one will abide in that samƒÅdhi and will realize the object of observation of mind.

original: de'i rang gi ngo bo rig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i rang gi ngo bo rig par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will know its nature.

original: de ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: de ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: That is the samadhi of self-consecration.

original: 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rnyed par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rnyed par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One attains means one obtains.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin de la @170a * //üîΩgnas nas / yang dag mtha' zhes bya ba chos thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur bas na yang dag mtha' zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin de la @170a * // gnas nas / yang dag mtha' zhes bya ba chos thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur bas na yang dag mtha' zhes bya'o //
translated: Abiding in that illusion-like samadhi,

original: de rnams kyi mtha' ni rtse mo ste mthar thug pa'i zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi mtha' ni rtse mo ste mthar thug pa'i zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: the end of reality is the peak, up to the ultimate.

original: 'od gsal ba'i ngo bor gyur pa des sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par sbyong bar byed do //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba'i ngo bor gyur pa des sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par sbyong bar byed do //
translated: By that which has become the nature of clear light, the illusion-like samadhi is purified.

original: de las langs nas gnyis med ye shes bya ba rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las langs nas gnyis med ye shes bya ba rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Rising from that, one attains the state of Great Vajradhara, called the non-dual wisdom.

original: zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas /
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas /
translated: Abiding in the samadhi of union,

original: slar zheng gang la'ang mi slob po zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba gang ci yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //üîΩ'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o //
analyzed: slar zheng gang la'ang mi slob po zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba gang ci yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o // 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o //
translated: And again, not even an inch wide means that there is nothing whatsoever to be accomplished by oneself.üîΩHere, the perfect yogi is the ultimate, and vajra repetition, etc.

original: rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa ni brtags pa nyid do //üîΩde nas zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal las langs nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa ni brtags pa nyid do // de nas zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal las langs nas so //
translated: are just imagined.

original: 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs la //
analyzed: 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs la //
translated: Then, after rising from clear light means after rising from clear light.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la srid gsum zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la srid gsum zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The three worlds are characterized by desire, form, and formlessness.

original: skad cig de la zhes bya ba ni skad cig gcig nyid la'o //
analyzed: skad cig de la zhes bya ba ni skad cig gcig nyid la'o //
translated: In in that instant, instant means in one instant.

original: ji ltar zhe ba /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe ba /
translated: How?

original: 'od gsal bas rnam par dag pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: 'od gsal bas rnam par dag pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: He says by the purity of clear light, etc.

original: 'di dag ces bya ba ni bstan ma thag pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di dag ces bya ba ni bstan ma thag pa rnams so //
translated: Here, these refers to the just-mentioned [stages].

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni man ngag go //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni man ngag go //
translated: The very same is the instruction.

original: rgyas btab ces bya ba ni shin tu sbas pa'o //
analyzed: rgyas btab ces bya ba ni shin tu sbas pa'o //
translated: The seal is the very hidden.

original: 'o na ji ltar shes she na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar shes she na /
translated: But how is it known?

original: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
translated: Following the explanatory tantra,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: and so on.

original: de ltar na yang ji ltar shes par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na yang ji ltar shes par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But how is it known?üîΩ From the guru's mouth,

original: bla ma'i kha las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so //
analyzed: bla ma'i kha las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so //
translated: and so on.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pas bshad pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs kyi bshad pa'i rnam pa gzhan yod pas de cung zhig 'dir brjod par 'dod nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pas bshad pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs kyi bshad pa'i rnam pa gzhan yod pas de cung zhig 'dir brjod par 'dod nas /
translated: The BhagavƒÅn has explained the stage of completion with an intention, so another aspect of the explanation exists.

original: sna'i rtse mor zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te kun rdzob kyi sna'i rtse mo'o //
analyzed: sna'i rtse mor zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te kun rdzob kyi sna'i rtse mo'o //
translated: Desiring to say a little about that here, he says at the tip of the nose, and so on. The relative tip of the nose is the ultimate tip of the nose.

original: yungs kar zhes bya ba ni rlung la chos kyi brdar btags pa'o //
analyzed: yungs kar zhes bya ba ni rlung la chos kyi brdar btags pa'o //
translated: Mustard seed is a conventional symbol for wind.

original: bsam zhes bya ba ni sems nges par gtad par bya ba'o ;
analyzed: bsam zhes bya ba ni sems nges par gtad par bya ba'o ;
translated: Think means to focus the mind.

original: / ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: / ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: gang gi phyir yungs kar zhes bya ba ni rlung ngo //
analyzed: gang gi phyir yungs kar zhes bya ba ni rlung ngo //
translated: Because mustard seed is wind.

original: 'gro dang mi 'gro zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba 'jug par byed pas na 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba ste yid nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'gro dang mi 'gro zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba 'jug par byed pas na 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba ste yid nyid yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúMoving and unmoving‚Äù means that the mind itself is moving and unmoving, because it causes movement and non-movement.

original: gang gi phyir rlung med par yid kyi 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad du yod pa ma yin pa'i @170b phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rlung med par yid kyi 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad du yod pa ma yin pa'i @170b phyir ro //
translated: Because without wind, there is no movement or coming and going of the mind, and so on.

original: de'i phyir yungs kar te /
analyzed: de'i phyir yungs kar te /
translated: Therefore, the mustard seed

original: rlung de'i gnas skabs su bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rlung de'i gnas skabs su bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: is the state of that wind, which is to be cultivated.üîΩThe abode of wisdom is delightful,

original: ye shes gnas ni nyams dga' ba ni ye shes kyi gsal ba ste rab tu gnas pa dang bzhon pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: ye shes gnas ni nyams dga' ba ni ye shes kyi gsal ba ste rab tu gnas pa dang bzhon pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: the abode of the clarity of wisdom, up to the mount.

original: gsang ba ni ba skyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa la sba bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: gsang ba ni ba skyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa la sba bar bya ba'o //
translated: It is secret, to be concealed from the yogin who is in the stage of generation.

original: ye shes zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid kyi sgras btags pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid kyi sgras btags pa'o //
translated: Wisdom is designated by the word ‚Äúreality.‚Äù

original: kha dog sna lnga pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kha dog sna lnga pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Five-colored means that it is the nature of the five tathƒÅgatas.

original: rin chen zhes bya ba ni legs par spyad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi spyod yul nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩyungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam //
analyzed: rin chen zhes bya ba ni legs par spyad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi spyod yul nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam //
translated: Jewel is so called because it is the domain of those endowed with good conduct.üîΩThe size of a mustard seed.

original: zhes bya ba ni yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam phra ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam phra ba'o //
translated: The size of a mustard seed means subtle, like a mustard seed.

original: gang la yungs kar gyi 'bru tshod tsam yod pa de la yungs kar gyi 'bru tshod tsam zhes bya ste /
analyzed: gang la yungs kar gyi 'bru tshod tsam yod pa de la yungs kar gyi 'bru tshod tsam zhes bya ste /
translated: That which has the size of a mustard seed is called the size of a mustard seed.

original: khams phra ba'i gzugs can rlung zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khams phra ba'i gzugs can rlung zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It means subtle form wind.

original: sna'i rtse mos zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni lha'i rnal 'byor te bshad pa gcig yin no //
analyzed: sna'i rtse mos zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni lha'i rnal 'byor te bshad pa gcig yin no //
translated: At the tip of the nose, etc. Yoga means divine yoga, which is one explanation.

original: sna'i rtse mor yungs kar zhes bya ba ni a'a li dang k'a li'i dbus su'o //
analyzed: sna'i rtse mor yungs kar zhes bya ba ni a'a li dang k'a li'i dbus su'o //
translated: At the tip of the nose, mustard means in the middle of ƒÅlikƒÅli.

original: yungs kar zhes bya ba ni phra ba'i gzugs can nyid kyi yid do //
analyzed: yungs kar zhes bya ba ni phra ba'i gzugs can nyid kyi yid do //
translated: Mustard means the subtle form mind.

original: bsam zhes bya ba ni dran par bya /üîΩgtad par bya /
analyzed: bsam zhes bya ba ni dran par bya / gtad par bya /
translated: Contemplate means to remember.

original: brtan par bya zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: brtan par bya zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: To focus means to stabilize.üîΩTo make firm is the intended meaning.

original: gang gi phyir yungs kar zhes bya ba yid kyi 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba ste rten dang brten par gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i gzugs su sgom par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir yungs kar zhes bya ba yid kyi 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba ste rten dang brten par gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i gzugs su sgom par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the mustard seed, the form of the mandala wheel, which is the abode and the abider, the movement and non-movement of the mind, is meditated upon.

original: de lta bas na 'ba' zhig bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: de lta bas na 'ba' zhig bsgoms pas so //
translated: Therefore, by meditating on just that,

original: rdo rje 'chang gi dkyil 'khor dang / dkyil 'khor pa dang bcas pa bsgom par byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang gi dkyil 'khor dang / dkyil 'khor pa dang bcas pa bsgom par byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: the mandala of Vajradhara and the mandala with the retinue is meditated upon.

original: ci'i phyir de ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Why is that so?

original: ye shes kyi gnas dang / rab tu gnas pa dang / gnyug ma'i gnas zhes bya ba'i bar du yin no //
analyzed: ye shes kyi gnas dang / rab tu gnas pa dang / gnyug ma'i gnas zhes bya ba'i bar du yin no //
translated: It is because of the abode of wisdom, the abode of the supreme, and the innate abode.

original: nyams dga' ba ni mchog tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: nyams dga' ba ni mchog tu gyur pa'o //
translated: Supreme is the best.

original: gsang ba ni sba bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: gsang ba ni sba bar bya ba ste /
translated: Secret is to be kept.

original: bla ma'i zhal nas thob par bya ba ste sngar bstan pa bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal nas thob par bya ba ste sngar bstan pa bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood as previously explained, to be obtained from the guru's mouth.

original: ye shes kyi brtags zhes bya ba ni ye shes gsum gyi ngo bo rlung zhes bya bar brtags pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ye shes kyi brtags zhes bya ba ni ye shes gsum gyi ngo bo rlung zhes bya bar brtags pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The designation of wisdom means that the essence of the three wisdoms is designated as the vƒÅyu.

original: rigs lnga'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir kha dog rnam lnga pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rigs lnga'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir kha dog rnam lnga pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called ‚Äúfive-colored‚Äù because it is the nature of the five families.

original: rin chen lta bu'i gang zag las gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir rin chen zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rin chen lta bu'i gang zag las gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir rin chen zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called ‚Äújewel‚Äù because it is not the domain of those who are not suitable vessels.

original: yungs kar gyi 'bru tshod tsam zhes bya ba ni shin tu @171a * //
analyzed: yungs kar gyi 'bru tshod tsam zhes bya ba ni shin tu @171a * //
translated: ‚ÄúThe size of a mustard seed‚Äù means it is very subtle.

original: phra ba'o // sna'i rtse mor zhes bya ba ni sdig pa spangs par ro //
analyzed: phra ba'o // sna'i rtse mor zhes bya ba ni sdig pa spangs par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúAt the tip of the nose‚Äù means it is abandoned at the tip of the nose.

original: nan tan du zhes bya ba ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid kyis so //
analyzed: nan tan du zhes bya ba ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i yid kyis so //
translated: ‚ÄúWith effort‚Äù means with a mind in equipoise.

original: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni ro ma dang rkyang ma dag yang dag par 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni ro ma dang rkyang ma dag yang dag par 'byor pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúYoga‚Äù means the union of the lalanƒÅ and rasanƒÅ.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni nyin dang mtshan du'o //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni nyin dang mtshan du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAlways‚Äù means day and night.

original: de'i phyir slob dpon gyis kyang 'di ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir slob dpon gyis kyang 'di ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o zhes bstan pa yin te /
translated: Therefore the master also teaches that this is an explanation by way of the intention.

original: bla ma gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa las shes par bya ba yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: bla ma gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa las shes par bya ba yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: It should be known from the lineage of gurus, not from elsewhere.

original: rdo rje'i tshig 'di zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rdo rje'i tshig 'di zhes bya ba la /
translated: The phrase these vajra words.

original: rdo rje mi phyed pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: rdo rje mi phyed pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Vajra is the indivisible pristine awareness.

original: de gsal bar byed pa'i bshad bsdam bzhin pa'i don ston pa'i phyir bshad pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de gsal bar byed pa'i bshad bsdam bzhin pa'i don ston pa'i phyir bshad pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In order to show the meaning of the present explanation, which clarifies that, the phrase the explanation is stated.

original: ma lus par ston cing rab tu gsal bar byed pa gang yin pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bshad pa'i rgyud las gsungs te /
analyzed: ma lus par ston cing rab tu gsal bar byed pa gang yin pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bshad pa'i rgyud las gsungs te /
translated: The Blessed One taught it in the explanatory tantra called the Shri Guhyasamaja, The one who teaches and clarifies it in its entirety.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni sna'i rtse mor zhes bya ba la sogs pas gang bsgrubs pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni sna'i rtse mor zhes bya ba la sogs pas gang bsgrubs pa'o //
translated: The phrase that refers to what was established by the passage beginning at the tip of the nose.

original: snying po zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim par bstan pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: snying po zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim par bstan pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The phrase the essence refers to the subtle yoga taught in the creation stage.

original: de bas na snying por gyur cing snying por 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na snying por gyur cing snying por 'jug pa'o //

original: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni phul du byung ba ste /
analyzed: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni phul du byung ba ste /

original: rnal 'byor byis pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor byis pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'o //

original: sangs rgyas kun zhes bya ba 'dis ni rnal 'byor 'di la shin tu gus par bya ba bstan te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun zhes bya ba 'dis ni rnal 'byor 'di la shin tu gus par bya ba bstan te /

original: sangs rgyas rnams la yang gsang bar bya ba yin na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams la yang gsang bar bya ba yin na /
translated: If it is to be kept secret even from the Buddhas,

original: de las gzhan dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de las gzhan dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bstan pa yin no //

original: gang de zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gang de zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'o //

original: ci zhig ce na thams cad bdag nyid ces bya ba ste //
analyzed: ci zhig ce na thams cad bdag nyid ces bya ba ste //

original: 'gro ba'i lus la mngon par khyab pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i lus la mngon par khyab pa'o //

original: ye shes lnga'i dngos zhes bya ba ni me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa lnga'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: ye shes lnga'i dngos zhes bya ba ni me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa lnga'i rang bzhin no //

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i 'dod pa rnams la de nyid thob pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir de nyid do //

original: yungs kar gyi ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni don sngar bstan pa nyid dran par bya'o //
analyzed: yungs kar gyi ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni don sngar bstan pa nyid dran par bya'o //

original: lha rdzas yin pas na rnam par shes pa'i khams la lha zhes bya ste /

analyzed: yongs su gyur pa zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum yongs su gyur pa las lha'i rnam par gang gyur pa de ni nye bar dmigs pa ste nye bar dmigs pa zhes grags pa'o //
translated: The transformation is the divine form that comes from the transformation of the three syllables. That is the visualization, which is well known as the visualization.

original: aa'i bshad pa zhes bya ba ni aa'i nye bar bstan pa ste /
analyzed: aa'i bshad pa zhes bya ba ni aa'i nye bar bstan pa ste /
translated: The explanation of the A is the teaching of the A.

original: sdig spangs ma zhes bya bar gang grags pa'i ye shes ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi snang ba med pa'i thugs so //
analyzed: sdig spangs ma zhes bya bar gang grags pa'i ye shes ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi snang ba med pa'i thugs so //
translated: The wisdom that is known as the one who abandons evil is the non-conceptual mind of the Buddhas.

original: aom gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: aom gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The Om and so forth.

original: sdud ces bya ba ni bdag la sdud par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sdud ces bya ba ni bdag la sdud par byed pa'o //
translated: The gathering is the gathering into oneself.

original: h'um gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: h'um gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The Hum and so forth.

original: yang dag spros zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su nye bar spro bar byed pa ste sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du byed pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag spros zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su nye bar spro bar byed pa ste sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du byed pa'o //
translated: The perfect emanation is the emanation in the form of a Buddha, that is, the creation of the nature of a Buddha.

original: aa ni gnas par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: aa ni gnas par gyur pa'o //
translated: The A is the abiding.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus la gnas par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus la gnas par byed pa'o //
translated: That is, it causes one to abide in one's own body.

original: 'jug pa dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'jug pa dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The entering and so forth.üîΩ

original: rlung nyid aom gyis ni 'jug par byed do //
analyzed: rlung nyid aom gyis ni 'jug par byed do //
translated: The wind itself is caused to enter by the syllable Om.

original: aas ni gnas par byed do ;
analyzed: aas ni gnas par byed do ;
translated: It is caused to abide by the syllable Ah.

original: / h'um gis ni spro bar byed pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: / h'um gis ni spro bar byed pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: And it is caused to spread by the syllable Hum.

original: sngags kyi yan lag ces bya ba ni dran pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rlung 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldan pa'i rim gyis gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi yan lag ces bya ba ni dran pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rlung 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldan pa'i rim gyis gnas pa'o //
translated: The ‚Äúlimbs of mantra‚Äù are the abiding of the wind in the body by the process of entering, abiding, and rising, through the samadhi of single mindfulness.

original: shes rab thabs kyi gzhir gnas te //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi gzhir gnas te //
translated: Abiding in the basis of wisdom and means

original: zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi rtsa gsum yi ge gsum gyi ngo bor yang dag par sbyor ba'i gzhir gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi rtsa gsum yi ge gsum gyi ngo bor yang dag par sbyor ba'i gzhir gnas pa'o //
translated: means abiding in the basis of the union of the three syllables with the nature of the three channels, which have the nature of the wisdom of the nondual union of wisdom and means.

original: da ni bzlas pa'i grangs bstan pa'i phyir gos dkar la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa ste /
analyzed: da ni bzlas pa'i grangs bstan pa'i phyir gos dkar la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa ste /
translated: Now, in order to teach the number of recitations, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚Äúthe white-clad and so forth,‚Äù and so on.

original: bzlas zhes bya ba ni rlung gi 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: bzlas zhes bya ba ni rlung gi 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Recitation‚Äù is the going and coming of the wind.

original: brgya phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lnga ni me la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor so so la nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i nyis brgya 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: brgya phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lnga ni me la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor so so la nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i nyis brgya 'byung ba'o //

original: bzhi po legs par bsgres nas ni //
analyzed: bzhi po legs par bsgres nas ni //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa yin te /

analyzed: @174b dkyil 'khor bzhi nyi shu rtsa bzhir rim gyis 'byung ba'o //

original: thun mtshams bzhir ni rab sbyor la //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nyin zhag gcig la'o // 'bum zhes bya ba ni mtshon par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid do //

original: yi ge bzlas pa byed pa de nyid rdo rje bzlas pa zhes bstan pa yin no zhe na /üîΩsngags lus rang nyid mngon gyur nas //
analyzed: yi ge bzlas pa byed pa de nyid rdo rje bzlas pa zhes bstan pa yin no zhe na / sngags lus rang nyid mngon gyur nas //

original: zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: The reply is: When the mantra body is manifest to oneself,

original: bdag nyid yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo rtsa gsum gyis bskyed pa'i lus su gnas pa yin na /
analyzed: bdag nyid yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo rtsa gsum gyis bskyed pa'i lus su gnas pa yin na /
translated: If one's own body is generated by the three channels, which have the nature of the three syllables,

original: gzhan brtag pa'i yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo nyid la 'dod par byed ces bya bar bsams pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan brtag pa'i yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo nyid la 'dod par byed ces bya bar bsams pa'o //
translated: one should imagine that the other three syllables, which have the nature of the three vajras, are in the three places.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni phyogs gzhan ston pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni phyogs gzhan ston pa'o //
translated: Again, another indicates a different position.

original: rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya ba ni rdo rje slob dpon no //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin zhes bya ba ni rdo rje slob dpon no //

translated: The one endowed with the three yogas is the one who has the three yogas of exhalation, inhalation, and retention.

original: spyan drangs zhes bya ba ni dgug pa'o //
analyzed: spyan drangs zhes bya ba ni dgug pa'o //

original: myur ba zhes bya ba ni phyir 'byung ba'i rlung ngo //
analyzed: myur ba zhes bya ba ni phyir 'byung ba'i rlung ngo //

original: gshegs su gsol zhes bya ba ni khyad par can gyi gshegs su gsol pa'o //
analyzed: gshegs su gsol zhes bya ba ni khyad par can gyi gshegs su gsol pa'o //

original: gnyi ga min par zhes bya ba ni rlung gnas pa'i ngo bo ste des bzhugs su gsol ba'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga min par zhes bya ba ni rlung gnas pa'i ngo bo ste des bzhugs su gsol ba'o //

original: sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs yongs su bskyod pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs yongs su bskyod pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: ‚Äú Various‚Äù is the characteristic of the complete shaking of the various [winds].

original: sngags sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum dang sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: sngags sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum dang sbyor ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Mantra application‚Äù is the application of the three syllables.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rnal 'byor dbang phyug ces bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rnal 'byor dbang phyug ces bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //

original: gsang ba'i yi ge zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i sna la gnas pa'i mi shigs pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i yi ge zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i sna la gnas pa'i mi shigs pa'o //
translated: The secret syllable is the indestructible drop located in the secret nose.

original: de nyid ni 'byung ba med pa yin pas na yi ge'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni 'byung ba med pa yin pas na yi ge'o //
translated: That itself is the syllable because it is without origination.

original: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang thabs kyi rnal 'byor ro //üîΩdes na dngos grub ni phyag rgya @175a * //
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang thabs kyi rnal 'byor ro // des na dngos grub ni phyag rgya @175a * //

original: chen po'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: chen po'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: By that, the power is the characteristic of the great seal.

original: de nyid ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni 'bras bu'o //
translated: That itself is the result.

original: gang zhig ces bya ba ni rtsa gsum gyi rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ni rtsa gsum gyi rnal 'byor ro //

original: bsams pa zhes bya ba ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis so //
analyzed: bsams pa zhes bya ba ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis so //

original: rnal 'byor can ni sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor can ni sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'o //

original: rnal 'byor gnyis pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gnyis pa bstan pa'i phyir /

original: dang po'i yi ge zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: dang po'i yi ge zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: he says, The first letter, and so on.

original: yi ge aom gyi ngo bos so //
analyzed: yi ge aom gyi ngo bos so //
translated: By the nature of the letter a.

original: brgyad pa'i mtha' dang zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um gis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: brgyad pa'i mtha' dang zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um gis zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: ci dga' ba'i bzlas pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngag gis zlos pa'o //

analyzed: khri phrag gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gsang ba'i dgongs pa zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: dgongs pa lung ston pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor gyi rgyud do //

original: bsam gtan kha thon zhes bya ba ni lha'i sku bsgom pa dang sngags zlos pa med kyang ngo //

original: cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba ni go rims bzhin no //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba ni go rims bzhin no //

analyzed: bsgrub par bya zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //

original: sgyu ma lta bu zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //

original: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ci zhig smra zhe na /
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ci zhig smra zhe na /
translated: Therefore, what is said beginning with ‚Äútherefore‚Äù?

original: mnyam med sngags ni 'di nyid bzlas nas su //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /

analyzed: sngags zhes bya ba ni yid nyid skyob par byed pas na sngags te /

analyzed: stong ba nyid dang snying rje gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid mi shigs pa'o //

original: bsgrub pa'i bdag nyid can ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub pa'i bdag nyid can ni rnal 'byor pa'o //

analyzed: khams zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum mnyam par bsdus pa ni khams gsum ste sku dang gsung dang thugs so //
translated: The ‚Äúrealm‚Äù is the three worlds, which are included in the three bodies, speech, and minds.

analyzed: 'bum phrag drug ces bya ba la sogs pa ni zla ba gcig bzlas pa'i brjod pa'o //

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag byas nas //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mchod pa byas nas so //

original: pha rol pha rol mi ldog 'gyur //
analyzed: pha rol pha rol mi ldog 'gyur //

translated: Emptiness, utter emptiness, and so on are stated.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'bras bu bsgrub par bya ba'i ngo bo ste thams cad stong pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'bras bu bsgrub par bya ba'i ngo bo ste thams cad stong pa'o //
translated: With regard to cause and effect, and so on, the nature of the effect to be accomplished is all emptiness.

original: rgyu ni sgrub pa'i thabs te /
analyzed: rgyu ni sgrub pa'i thabs te /
translated: The cause is the method of accomplishment,

original: stong pa dang shin tu stong pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa dang shin tu stong pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: the characteristic of emptiness and utter emptiness.

original: de dag gi bye brag ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can te /
analyzed: de dag gi bye brag ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can te /
translated: Their distinctions have the characteristics that will be explained.

original: de'i phyir shes rab thabs su zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab thabs su zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: Therefore, wisdom and method and so on are stated.

original: shes rab stong pa dang snang ba dang sems so //
analyzed: shes rab stong pa dang snang ba dang sems so //
translated: Wisdom is emptiness, appearance, and mind.

original: thabs zhes bya ba ni shin tu stong pa dang / snang ba mched pa dang / sems las byung pa ste /
analyzed: thabs zhes bya ba ni shin tu stong pa dang / snang ba mched pa dang / sems las byung pa ste /
translated: Method is the very empty, the increase of appearance, and the arising of mind.

original: shes rab dang / thabs dang zhes bya ba gzhan dbang dang kun brtags zhes bya ba'i ming can no //
analyzed: shes rab dang / thabs dang zhes bya ba gzhan dbang dang kun brtags zhes bya ba'i ming can no //
translated: Wisdom and method are the dependent and the imagined.

original: de dag yang dag sbyor ba las ni rdzogs pa zhes bya ba yongs su gab pa'i shes pa'i ngo bo bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid can nye bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag yang dag sbyor ba las ni rdzogs pa zhes bya ba yongs su gab pa'i shes pa'i ngo bo bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid can nye bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: From the correct union of those, the so-called perfect arises, which is the nature of the secret wisdom, characterized by the stage of self-consecration.

original: nye bar thob par rdzogs gyur nas //
analyzed: nye bar thob par rdzogs gyur nas //
translated: Having attained the perfect,

original: zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlabs pa rdzogs nas ni thams cad stong pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlabs pa rdzogs nas ni thams cad stong pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: having completed self-consecration, one attains the state of all emptiness.

original: rgyu'i rim pa zhes bya ba ni bsgrub pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu'i rim pa zhes bya ba ni bsgrub pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The stage of cause is the stage of practice.

original: rnam shes gsum po 'byor pa las //
analyzed: rnam shes gsum po 'byor pa las //
translated: From the perfection of the three consciousnesses,

original: zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'i bya ba ni rang gi las kyis bsgrub pa'i yul du'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'i bya ba ni rang gi las kyis bsgrub pa'i yul du'o //
translated: the previously explained activity is the object to be accomplished by one‚Äôs own action.

original: rang bzhin ni ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin ni ngo bo nyid do //
translated: Nature is essence.

original: rlung ni rgyu bdag ces bya ba ni rlung 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: rlung ni rgyu bdag ces bya ba ni rlung 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'o //
translated: Wind is the movement of the life-force.

original: snang ba nyid kyis rgyur gyur pa las zhes bya ba ni snang ba dang snang ba mched pa'i mtshan nyid can thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyu'o //
analyzed: snang ba nyid kyis rgyur gyur pa las zhes bya ba ni snang ba dang snang ba mched pa'i mtshan nyid can thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyu'o //
translated: From the cause of the appearance itself means from the cause of method and wisdom, which have the characteristic of appearance and the appearance of increase.

original: bdag gi dngos por zhes bya pa ni lus yongs su gzung ba la rnam par rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi dngos por zhes bya pa ni lus yongs su gzung ba la rnam par rtogs pa'o //
translated: The state of self means the conceptualization of the body.

original: gnyis ka zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab bo //
analyzed: gnyis ka zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab bo //
translated: Both means method and wisdom.

original: yan lag ni cha shas so //
analyzed: yan lag ni cha shas so //
translated: The limbs are the parts.

original: 'gyur zhes bya ba ni ji srid kyi bar du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'gyur zhes bya ba ni ji srid kyi bar du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Become means for as long as.

original: don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning is this.

original: ji srid du thabs dang shes rab nye bar thob pa'i mtshan nyid can rtsa gsum gyi rnal 'byor gyis rlung gi rgyu ba mi g-yo bar ma gyur pa de srid du 'khor ba rnam par shes pa gsum bdag gi dngos por 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid yin no
analyzed: ji srid du thabs dang shes rab nye bar thob pa'i mtshan nyid can rtsa gsum gyi rnal 'byor gyis rlung gi rgyu ba mi g-yo bar ma gyur pa de srid du 'khor ba rnam par shes pa gsum bdag gi dngos por 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid yin no
translated: For as long as the yoga of the three nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s, which has the characteristic of the attainment of method and wisdom, does not become unmoving, for that long, samsara arises as the state of self, the three consciousnesses.

original: // rnam par shes pa gsum gyi ngo bo nyid thabs gang gis shes par nus pa ste bstan pa'i phyir //üîΩsgyu ma dag ni thams cad 'dus pa las //
analyzed: // rnam par shes pa gsum gyi ngo bo nyid thabs gang gis shes par nus pa ste bstan pa'i phyir // sgyu ma dag ni thams cad 'dus pa las //
translated: In order to teach by what means one can know the nature of the three consciousnesses,

original: zhes bya ba @177b la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba @177b la sogs pa smras te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúFrom the union of all illusions,‚Äù and so on.

original: ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the passage beginning ‚ÄúThe division of the three intuitions,‚Äù

original: 'dod chags zhes bya ba ni mchog tu dga' ba zhes brjod pa'i snang ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags zhes bya ba ni mchog tu dga' ba zhes brjod pa'i snang ba'o //
translated: ‚Äúpassion‚Äù is the appearance called ‚Äúsupreme joy.‚Äù

original: chags bral zhes bya ba ni dga' bral thon par byed pa'i snang ba mched pa'o //
analyzed: chags bral zhes bya ba ni dga' bral thon par byed pa'i snang ba mched pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Absence of passion‚Äù is the appearance of the ‚Äúarising of the absence of joy.‚Äù

original: de'i bar te zhes bya ba ni gnyi ga'i bar te chags pa bar ma lhan cig skyes pa zhes brjod pa snang ba nye bar ma thob pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bar te zhes bya ba ni gnyi ga'i bar te chags pa bar ma lhan cig skyes pa zhes brjod pa snang ba nye bar ma thob pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Between those two‚Äù is between the two, the ‚Äúintermediate passion,‚Äù called ‚Äúinnate,‚Äù the ‚Äúnon-acquisition of the appearance.‚Äù

original: dbang po gnyis zhes bya ba ni skyes pa dang bud med kyi'o //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis zhes bya ba ni skyes pa dang bud med kyi'o //
translated: ‚Äú The two organs‚Äù are the male and female organs.

original: mnyam sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni yang dag par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: mnyam sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni yang dag par sbyor ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Union‚Äù is the ‚Äúright union.‚Äù

original: gsal por mtshon par 'gyur ba nyid do snyam du bsam pa'o //
analyzed: gsal por mtshon par 'gyur ba nyid do snyam du bsam pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú It is clearly indicated‚Äù is the thought.

original: rdo rje padma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rdo rje padma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The vajra and lotus, etc.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi rtsa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi rtsa'o //

original: padma zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi rtsa'o //
analyzed: padma zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi rtsa'o //

original: ye shes gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'o //

original: zhes bya ba ni de'i ngo bo nyid kyi rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de'i ngo bo nyid kyi rtsa gnyis so //
translated: means the two channels that are its nature.

original: bshad pa yin zhes bya ba ni nges par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa yin zhes bya ba ni nges par bstan pa'o //

original: ye shes gnyis zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi gzugs can nyid do //
analyzed: ye shes gnyis zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi gzugs can nyid do //

original: ji skad bshad ces bya ba ni phyi rol gyi phyogs la ni 'dod pa'i bstan bcos las bstan pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: ji skad bshad ces bya ba ni phyi rol gyi phyogs la ni 'dod pa'i bstan bcos las bstan pa nyid kyis so //
translated: As explained means that the external aspect is taught in the treatises on desire,

original: nang gi bdag nyid kyi phyogs la ni bla mas bstan pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid kyi phyogs la ni bla mas bstan pa nyid kyis so //
translated: and the internal aspect is taught by the guru.

original: bya ba yis zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
analyzed: bya ba yis zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
translated: By action means by meditative concentration.

original: 'bad pas ye shes gang thob pa //
analyzed: 'bad pas ye shes gang thob pa //
translated: The intuition that is attained by effort

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: dmigs pa gzhan thams cad nub par gyur pa gnyis med par snang ba gang yin pa de ni snang ba nye bar thob pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa gzhan thams cad nub par gyur pa gnyis med par snang ba gang yin pa de ni snang ba nye bar thob pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: That appearance which is non-dual, in which all other objects have disappeared, should be known as the attainment of light.

original: nang gi bdag nyid can gyis mthar thug pa'i rnal 'byor gzhan yang bstan pa'i phyir gang gis chu skyes zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid can gyis mthar thug pa'i rnal 'byor gzhan yang bstan pa'i phyir gang gis chu skyes zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: In order to teach another yoga of the ultimate, which is of an internal nature, he says, by whom, etc.

original: rnal 'byor stobs kyis zhes bya ba ni nang gi thabs dang shes rab kyi rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor stobs kyis zhes bya ba ni nang gi thabs dang shes rab kyi rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis so //
translated: By the power of yoga means by the power of the yoga of internal means and insight.

original: lan cig ces bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i dus su lan cig go //
analyzed: lan cig ces bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i dus su lan cig go //
translated: Once means at the time of initiation.

original: dbye ba ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: dbye ba ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: According to the division means according to the nature of the external and internal.

original: ye shes tsam du gyur pa'i gzugs ni ye shes gzugs te /
analyzed: ye shes tsam du gyur pa'i gzugs ni ye shes gzugs te /

original: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: It is the samadhi of self-consecration.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni sngar bstan pa'o //

original: ji ltar sprin ni sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ji ltar sprin ni sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As it is said, ‚ÄúThe cloud of various forms‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: 'od gsal bar zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal bar zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i mtha'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the clear light‚Äù means in the perfect end.

original: de 'dra'i zhes bya ba ni 'di 'dra ba'i'o //
analyzed: de 'dra'i zhes bya ba ni 'di 'dra ba'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSuch‚Äù means like this.

original: rang bzhin ma shes pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo ma shes pas so //
analyzed: rang bzhin ma shes pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo ma shes pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúNot knowing the nature‚Äù means not knowing the essence.

original: byas nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: byas nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúHaving created‚Äù and so forth.

original: 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar gyur @178a * //
analyzed: 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar gyur @178a * //
translated: In the five migrations of cyclic existence.

original: pa'o ; / mtshams med pa la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: pa'o ; / mtshams med pa la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúThe immeasurables and so forth‚Äù and so forth.

original: 'thob pa zhes bya ba ni legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa la nye bar spyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'thob pa zhes bya ba ni legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa la nye bar spyod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAttainment‚Äù means the experience of good and bad actions.

original: rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni gsal por ma bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni gsal por ma bstan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúDelusion‚Äù means not clearly taught.

original: rang bzhin goms pa'i tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: rang bzhin goms pa'i tshul gyis ni //
translated: By the method of cultivating the nature

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: chags pa dang / chags pa dang bral ba dang / chags pa bar ma dag la goms pa'i sbyor bas so //
analyzed: chags pa dang / chags pa dang bral ba dang / chags pa bar ma dag la goms pa'i sbyor bas so //
translated: By the application of cultivating attachment, nonattachment, and middling attachment.

original: shes nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: shes nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúHaving known‚Äù and so forth.

original: ye shes can zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa de grol bar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ye shes can zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa de grol bar byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: The one called endowed with intuition is the one who will liberate the one who has attained the meditative concentration of self-consecration.

original: da ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs kyis kyang ye shes gsum gyi phyag rgya bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir de bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs kyis kyang ye shes gsum gyi phyag rgya bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba bstan pa'i phyir de bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate that one should cultivate the seal of the three intuitions even by means of the stage of generation, he says,

original: shes rab ngo bo 'di nyid ni //
analyzed: shes rab ngo bo 'di nyid ni //
translated: This very nature of wisdom

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: and so on.

original: thabs su bshad ces bya ba ni thabs kyi ye shes mtshon par byed pa'o //
analyzed: thabs su bshad ces bya ba ni thabs kyi ye shes mtshon par byed pa'o //
translated: The explanation of the means is the means intuition, which is indicated.

original: phyag rgya bzhis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la stong pa bzhi'i phyag rgyas mngon par rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la stong pa bzhi'i phyag rgyas mngon par rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: The four seals are the four emptiness seals.

original: lha'i nga rgyal zhes bya ba ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal lo //üîΩji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: lha'i nga rgyal zhes bya ba ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal lo // ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: The divine pride is the pride of identity.

original: yongs rdzogs rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'od gsal ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yongs rdzogs rnal 'byor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'od gsal ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: As to how, and so on, the complete yoga is the clear light.

original: de nyid ye shes rnam dag gnas //
analyzed: de nyid ye shes rnam dag gnas //
translated: That is the abode of pure intuition.

original: zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid do //
translated: This is reality.

original: 'gyur ba med ces bya ba ni rnam par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'gyur ba med ces bya ba ni rnam par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is unchanging, because it is not subject to transformation.

original: 'di la snang ba'i rnam pa yod pa ma yin pas snang ba med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la snang ba'i rnam pa yod pa ma yin pas snang ba med pa'o //
translated: It is non-apparent, because it is not an object of appearance.

original: chad pa dang rtag pa'i mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir gnyis med do //
analyzed: chad pa dang rtag pa'i mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir gnyis med do //
translated: It is non-dual, because it is free from the two extremes of annihilation and permanence.

original: thams cad kyi dam par gyur pas na mchog go //
analyzed: thams cad kyi dam par gyur pas na mchog go //
translated: It is the supreme, because it is the best of all.

original: 'gro ba rnams kyi mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i rgyu dang bcas pas na zhi ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams kyi mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i rgyu dang bcas pas na zhi ba'o //
translated: It is peace, because it is the cause of the higher realms and ultimate good for all beings.

original: de ni tshig gi spyod yul min //
analyzed: de ni tshig gi spyod yul min //
translated: It is not the domain of speech.

original: zhes bya ba ni brjod du med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni brjod du med pa'o //
translated: This is inexpressible.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

original: ye shes gsum zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i ye shes gsum mo //üîΩde nas zhes bya ba ni don 'di nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ye shes gsum zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i ye shes gsum mo // de nas zhes bya ba ni don 'di nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: The three intuitions are the three undefiled intuitions.üîΩThen, etc.

original: de skad du rgya cher rol pa las bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de skad du rgya cher rol pa las bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is taught extensively in the Lalita Vistara.

original: 'di zhes bya bas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya bas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: The thus-gone is indicated by the word this.

original: sh'akya thub pas bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: sh'akya thub pas bstan pa yin no //
translated: It is taught by ≈öƒÅkyamuni.

original: stong pa chen po zhes bya ba ni chags pa bar ma'i mtshan nyid can snang ba nye bar thob pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa chen po zhes bya ba ni chags pa bar ma'i mtshan nyid can snang ba nye bar thob pa'o //
translated: The great emptiness is the attainment of the light, which has the characteristic of middling attachment.

original: bzhugs zhes bya ba ni nye bar bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: bzhugs zhes bya ba ni nye bar bzhugs pa'o //
translated: The word abides means is present.

original: mi g-yo zhes bya ba ni stong pa chen po 'di nyid kyi ming @178b yin no //
analyzed: mi g-yo zhes bya ba ni stong pa chen po 'di nyid kyi ming @178b yin no //
translated: The word unmoving is the name of this great emptiness.

original: til gyi gong bu zhes bya ba ni til gyi gong bu dang 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin tu yang dag par gyur par bstan to //
analyzed: til gyi gong bu zhes bya ba ni til gyi gong bu dang 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin tu yang dag par gyur par bstan to //
translated: The word sesame indicates that the tathƒÅgatas are taught to be very pure, like a sesame seed.

original: dbyangs gcig gis zhes bya ba ni gsung gcig gis so //
analyzed: dbyangs gcig gis zhes bya ba ni gsung gcig gis so //
translated: The word with one voice means with one sound.

original: rnam dag min zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rnam dag min zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The word impure and so forth.

original: mthar thug mi 'thob ces bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub po //
analyzed: mthar thug mi 'thob ces bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub po //
translated: The word not attained means not attained perfect enlightenment.

original: 'od gsal ba ni dmigs shig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba ni dmigs shig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The word radiant and so forth.

original: kun gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang nyid do //
analyzed: kun gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang nyid do //
translated: The word lord of all means Vajradhara.

original: 'di ltar sgra de gsan pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'di ltar sgra de gsan pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Thus, having heard that sound and so on.

original: nam phyed dus su zhes bya ba ni nam phyed 'das pa'i tshe'o //
analyzed: nam phyed dus su zhes bya ba ni nam phyed 'das pa'i tshe'o //
translated: At midnight means when midnight has passed.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni man ngag rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni man ngag rnyed pa'o //
