original: 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin ji ltar 'dod par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin ji ltar 'dod par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach clear light samadhi as desired,

original: sku ni drang por ma yin zhing //
analyzed: sku ni drang por ma yin zhing //
translated: The body is not straight and so on.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te dang ba ni rnyog ma med pa ste dri ma dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te dang ba ni rnyog ma med pa ste dri ma dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Clear means unpolluted, because of being free from stains.

original: bla ma nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas nye bar bstan pa nyid do //
analyzed: bla ma nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas nye bar bstan pa nyid do //
translated: The guru himself means taught by the Tathagata himself.

original: 'das dang ma 'ongs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la chu zla dang zhes bya ba ni chu zla dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: 'das dang ma 'ongs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la chu zla dang zhes bya ba ni chu zla dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: Past and future and so on. The moon in water means like the moon in water.

original: skya rengs 'char ba zhes bya ba ni snang ba dang / snang ba mched pa dang / snang ba thob pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i skad cig la dus zhes bya'o //
analyzed: skya rengs 'char ba zhes bya ba ni snang ba dang / snang ba mched pa dang / snang ba thob pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i skad cig la dus zhes bya'o //
translated: The rising of the dawn means the moment free from the characteristics of appearance, increase of appearance, and attainment of appearance is called time.

original: thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin gyis //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin gyis //
translated: By means of the samadhi of means and wisdom,

original: zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: This refers to the yoga of non-duality.

original: byang chub snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi shing drung du'o //
analyzed: byang chub snying po zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi shing drung du'o //
translated: The ‚Äúessence of enlightenment‚Äù is the foot of the tree of enlightenment.

original: yang na byang chub snying por zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang thabs gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin te de nyid ni rtsa ba yin te byang chub 'thob pa'i byed pa po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na byang chub snying por zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang thabs gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin te de nyid ni rtsa ba yin te byang chub 'thob pa'i byed pa po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or else, the ‚Äúessence of enlightenment‚Äù is the samadhi of the non-duality of wisdom and means, and that is the root, because it is the agent of the attainment of enlightenment.

original: legs thob nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: legs thob nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Having attained the good, etc.

original: ye shes gsum ni bstan pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: ye shes gsum ni bstan pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The three wisdoms have the characteristic of teaching.

original: 'gro ba gsum zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba gsum zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'o //
translated: The ‚Äúthree migrations‚Äù are those that occur in the desire, form, and formless realms.

original: ston par mtshan pa ni skad sna tshogs kyis so //
analyzed: ston par mtshan pa ni skad sna tshogs kyis so //
translated: The characteristic of teaching is by means of various languages.

original: de nyid ye shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nyid ye shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: That itself is wisdom, etc.

original: mngon par byang chub ston pa ni 'od gsal ba'i go 'phang ngo //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub ston pa ni 'od gsal ba'i go 'phang ngo //
translated: The teaching of manifest enlightenment is the state of clear light.

original: de kho na nyid kyi 'bras bu ston pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi 'bras bu ston pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the result of reality,

original: mtshams med lnga ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: mtshams med lnga ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThe five heinous acts‚Äù and so on.

original: 'thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas nyid do //
analyzed: 'thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas nyid do //
translated: ‚Äú One will attain‚Äù means buddhahood.

original: de kho na nyid thob pa tsam gyis ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: de kho na nyid thob pa tsam gyis ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: What is done merely by attaining reality?

original: spyod pa ci dga' bar spyod de zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: spyod pa ci dga' bar spyod de zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúOne acts as one pleases‚Äù and so on.

original: da ni de kho na nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni de kho na nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate the nature of reality,

original: chags med ces bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: chags med ces bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúFree from attachment‚Äù and so on.

original: sangs rgyas @179a * //
analyzed: sangs rgyas @179a * //
translated: All buddhas

original: kun dang mnyam sbyor ba //
analyzed: kun dang mnyam sbyor ba //
translated: are united.

original: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams tha dad pa nyid du mi rigs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams tha dad pa nyid du mi rigs so //
translated: Since it is the nature of the dharmakƒÅya, it is not reasonable for buddhas to be different.

original: ye shes gsum bral zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: ye shes gsum bral zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: ‚Äú Free from the three intuitions‚Äù is the meditative concentration of non-movement, which has the characteristic of being taught.

original: dngos med la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dngos med la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚Äú Non-entity and so on‚Äù and so on.

original: dpal ldan gsang 'dus zhes bya ba ni dpal gsang ba 'dus pa nyid do //
analyzed: dpal ldan gsang 'dus zhes bya ba ni dpal gsang ba 'dus pa nyid do //
translated: The glorious Guhyasamaja is the glorious Guhyasamaja itself.

original: 'dod chags la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the lines beginning Attachment and so on, and The various, and so on,

original: gzhan dag ces bya ba ni gzhan gang yang rung ngo //
analyzed: gzhan dag ces bya ba ni gzhan gang yang rung ngo //
translated: the others are any of the others.

original: chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /üîΩral pa zhes bya ba ni ral pa can no //
analyzed: chos phung brgyad khri bzhi stong zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / ral pa zhes bya ba ni ral pa can no //
translated: In the lines beginning The eighty-four thousand aggregates of Dharma, and so on,üîΩ the matted hair are the matted hair ascetics,

original: gcer bu zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi gos can no //
analyzed: gcer bu zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi gos can no //
translated: the naked are the faction of the naked,

original: mgo reg ces bya ba ni bregs pa'i phyir mgo reg ste rab tu byung ba'o //
analyzed: mgo reg ces bya ba ni bregs pa'i phyir mgo reg ste rab tu byung ba'o //
translated: the shaven-headed are the shaven-headed ascetics, that is, the renunciates,

original: cod pan ni cad pan 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: cod pan ni cad pan 'chad pa'o //
translated: the crown are the crown ascetics,

original: 'dus pa spong 'jug ces bya ba ni khyim gyi gnas yongs su gtong ba'o //
analyzed: 'dus pa spong 'jug ces bya ba ni khyim gyi gnas yongs su gtong ba'o //
translated: the those who reject assemblies are those who reject the household life,

original: 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa ldan pa'o //
translated: the desirous are those who are desirous,

original: de nyid ye shes zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ye shes zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: the wisdom is the clear light,

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni rtags kyi brtul zhugs can de'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni rtags kyi brtul zhugs can de'o //
translated: and the that itself is that very one who has the signs.

original: dang po'i las sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa tsam gyis ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
analyzed: dang po'i las sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa tsam gyis ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
translated: The beginner is one who has attained the concentration of the creation stage alone.

original: snang ba gsum po mthong ba dag / ces bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin tsam yongs su thob pa'o //
analyzed: snang ba gsum po mthong ba dag / ces bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin tsam yongs su thob pa'o //
translated: The vision of the three appearances is the attainment of the concentration of self-consecration alone.

original: gtsang ma'i gnas su zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus so //
analyzed: gtsang ma'i gnas su zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus so //
translated: The pure abode is the enjoyment body.

original: chos 'byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: chos 'byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The source of phenomena and so forth are the great seal.

original: de ni mngon par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid can thob nas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rtsed mo rgya chen pos spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pas byang chub pa'o //
analyzed: de ni mngon par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid can thob nas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rtsed mo rgya chen pos spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pas byang chub pa'o //
translated: Having attained the characteristic of manifest enlightenment, one is enlightened by the conduct of elaboration with the great play of passion and so forth.

original: chos dbyings mngon par byang chub pa ni ji ltar rnyed pa dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rtsed mos byang chub par 'dod pa ni chos dbyings mngon par byang chub pa'o //
analyzed: chos dbyings mngon par byang chub pa ni ji ltar rnyed pa dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rtsed mos byang chub par 'dod pa ni chos dbyings mngon par byang chub pa'o //
translated: The manifest enlightenment of the phenomena source is the desire for enlightenment by the play of passion and so forth, as it is attained.

original: bla med mngon par byang chub ni mngon par rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: bla med mngon par byang chub ni mngon par rtogs pa ste /
translated: The supreme manifest enlightenment is the realization.

original: gcig pu gnyis su med par bsam gtan gyi zas dang gnas pas spros pa med pa la sbyor ba nyid do //
analyzed: gcig pu gnyis su med par bsam gtan gyi zas dang gnas pas spros pa med pa la sbyor ba nyid do //
translated: He is alone, without a second, and is applied to the unelaborated by means of the food and abode of meditative concentration.

original: de nyid spros bcas la sogs pas bstan te /
analyzed: de nyid spros bcas la sogs pas bstan te /
translated: That itself is taught by the elaborated, etc.

original: spros bcas dang / spros med dang / shin tu spros med kyi spyod pas so //
analyzed: spros bcas dang / spros med dang / shin tu spros med kyi spyod pas so //
translated: By means of the elaborated, unelaborated, and very unelaborated conduct.

original: rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po'o //
translated: The ‚Äúyogin‚Äù is the adept.

original: yang gang zhig 'di skad du /üîΩmi dgos gzod nas dag pa yi //
analyzed: yang gang zhig 'di skad du / mi dgos gzod nas dag pa yi //
translated: Again, someone might say:

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras nas /
translated: ‚ÄúThere is no need for the creation stage, since the result is primordially pure.‚Äù

original: lan ni gang zhig de @179b ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: lan ni gang zhig de @179b ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The reply is: ‚ÄúWhoever says that . . .‚Äù

original: gang zhig ces bya ba ni med par smra ba'o //
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba ni med par smra ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWhoever‚Äù refers to the nihilist.

original: ye shes rim pa zhes bya ba ni thabs las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: ye shes rim pa zhes bya ba ni thabs las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: The ‚Äústages of wisdom‚Äù are the relative and ultimate natures that arise from the method.

original: de'i dbye ba zhes bya ba ni ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba'o //
analyzed: de'i dbye ba zhes bya ba ni ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúTheir divisions‚Äù are the divisions of the three wisdoms.

original: slar yang slob par ni slob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: slar yang slob par ni slob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAgain, one trains‚Äù means one trains.

original: bzhi pa zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe fourth‚Äù is clear light.

original: rnam gsum slob pa zhes bya ba ni spros bcas la sogs pa'i spyod pa'o //
analyzed: rnam gsum slob pa zhes bya ba ni spros bcas la sogs pa'i spyod pa'o //
translated: The three kinds of training are the conduct with elaboration, etc.

original: ji ltar shing la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ji ltar shing la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As it is said:

original: ma gtsubs zhes bya ba ni mi bsrubs pa'o //üîΩde ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'i snod dang snad ma yin pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma gtsubs zhes bya ba ni mi bsrubs pa'o // de ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'i snod dang snad ma yin pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Without friction, there is no fire.üîΩThis is in order to show that one is or is not a vessel for the stage of manifest enlightenment.

original: gang zhig g-yo sgyu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: gang zhig g-yo sgyu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: He says:

original: g-yo sgyu'i blo ni sems nyon mongs pa can no //
analyzed: g-yo sgyu'i blo ni sems nyon mongs pa can no //
translated: One who has a mind of deceit and fraud,

original: blo dman sems ldan zhes bya ba ni yid mi phyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: blo dman sems ldan zhes bya ba ni yid mi phyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
translated: A mind of little worth,

original: de'i phyir skyon rnams mthong gi zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir skyon rnams mthong gi zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore, one sees faults,üîΩAnd is not a vessel for the stage of manifest enlightenment.

original: nyon mongs zhes bya ba ni chung bar brtsi ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs zhes bya ba ni chung bar brtsi ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúlittle‚Äù is used for ‚Äúsmall.‚ÄùüîΩHe says:

original: bsnyen bkur med par zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: bsnyen bkur med par zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Without service, etc.

original: myur du zhes bya ba ni mnyes par ma byas par ro //
analyzed: myur du zhes bya ba ni mnyes par ma byas par ro //
translated: Quickly means without pleasing.

original: g-yo bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni bla ma'i thad nas so //
analyzed: g-yo bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni bla ma'i thad nas so //
translated: One moves away means from the presence of the guru.

original: tshogs nang zhes bya ba ni skye bo 'dus pa'i nang du'o //
analyzed: tshogs nang zhes bya ba ni skye bo 'dus pa'i nang du'o //
translated: In the assembly means in the midst of a group of people.

original: 'di la zhes bya ba ni bla ma'o //
analyzed: 'di la zhes bya ba ni bla ma'o //
translated: Here means in the presence of a guru.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni de ltar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni de ltar gyur pa'o //
translated: Thus means in that way.

original: bstan pas zhes bya ba ni bla ma'o //
analyzed: bstan pas zhes bya ba ni bla ma'o //
translated: By teaching means by a guru.

original: skal ba dang ldan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: skal ba dang ldan pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of being fortunate,

original: yon tan mchog ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: yon tan mchog ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: he is said to have supreme qualities, etc.

original: bcas pa zhes bya ba ni shin tu yang dag par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bcas pa zhes bya ba ni shin tu yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: Possessed means fully endowed.

original: rgyud mang rab tu thos shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rgyud mang rab tu thos shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Having heard many tantras, etc.

original: dbang med ces bya ba ni nus pa med pa'o //
analyzed: dbang med ces bya ba ni nus pa med pa'o //
translated: Powerless means without ability.

original: bstan bcos mchu zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos tsam mthos pa la ngal ba byas pa'o //
analyzed: bstan bcos mchu zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos tsam mthos pa la ngal ba byas pa'o //
translated: Having studied just the treatises, etc. means having exerted oneself in studying just the treatises.

original: yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Or, etc.

original: sbyor mi nus zhes bya ba ni tshig rnams sbyor ba dang bsdu bar mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor mi nus zhes bya ba ni tshig rnams sbyor ba dang bsdu bar mi nus pa'o //
translated: Unable to apply means unable to apply and collect the words.

original: gzhan don zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzhan la phan pa bya ba'i blo dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan don zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzhan la phan pa bya ba'i blo dang ldan pa'o //
translated: For the sake of others, etc. means having the intention to benefit others.

original: rgyud mang thos shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rgyud mang thos shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Having heard many tantras and so forth.

original: tshig don shes zhes bya ba ni mtha' drug gi don shes pa'o //
analyzed: tshig don shes zhes bya ba ni mtha' drug gi don shes pa'o //
translated: Knowing the words and meanings means knowing the meaning of the six limits.

original: rgyud rgyal zhes bya ba ni gsang ba 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud rgyal zhes bya ba ni gsang ba 'dus pa'o //
translated: The king of tantras is the Guhyasamaja.

original: rgyud rnams mang po thos zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rgyud rnams mang po thos zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Having heard many tantras and so forth.

original: 'phags pa rdo rje yi zhes bya ba ni klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas so //
analyzed: 'phags pa rdo rje yi zhes bya ba ni klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas so //
translated: The noble Vajra is Nagarjuna.

original: bla na med pa'i dgongs pa'i dka' 'grel lo //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i dgongs pa'i dka' 'grel lo //
translated: It is a commentary on the intention of the unsurpassed [vehicle].

original: gus pas thal mo sbyar nas ni //
analyzed: gus pas thal mo sbyar nas ni //
translated: With devotion, having joined palms,

original: @180a * // mchog tu mgo pos rab btud nas //
analyzed: @180a * // mchog tu mgo pos rab btud nas //
translated: Having bowed my head in supreme respect,

original: bdag gis byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bdag gis byang chub bsgrub pa'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing enlightenment,

original: klu sgrub la ni phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: klu sgrub la ni phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to Nagarjuna.

original: phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Having paid homage and so forth.

original: rdo rje che zhes bya ba ni chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: rdo rje che zhes bya ba ni chos kyi sku'o //
translated: The great vajra is the dharmakaya.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i gzugs ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i gzugs ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: The form of the principal deity of the mandala such as Vajrasattva is the sambhogakaya.

original: de la dang por zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de la dang por zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Regarding first and so forth.

original: rgyud rnam pa bzhi zhes bya ba ni bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i dbye ba'o //
analyzed: rgyud rnam pa bzhi zhes bya ba ni bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i dbye ba'o //
translated: The four kinds of tantras are the Action, the Performance, the Yoga, and the Supreme Yoga Tantra.

original: thob par bya ba'i ched du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: thob par bya ba'i ched du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: For the sake of attainment, etc.

original: slob dpon dang gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: slob dpon dang gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: means the consecration of the master, the secret consecration, and the consecration of wisdom knowledge.üîΩA sixteen-year-old, etc.

original: lo bcu drug lon pa'i zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa ste rgyud las gsungs pa dag go //
analyzed: lo bcu drug lon pa'i zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa ste rgyud las gsungs pa dag go //
translated: means a sixteen-year-old girl, and so on.üîΩAfter that, etc.

original: de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs so //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs so //
translated: means after the consecration.üîΩHollow, etc.

original: khong stong zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sbubs stong pa'o //
analyzed: khong stong zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sbubs stong pa'o //
translated: means hollow inside.üîΩWithout disease, etc.

original: bsnyun med ces bya ba ni skyon med pa'o //
analyzed: bsnyun med ces bya ba ni skyon med pa'o //
translated: means without fault.üîΩIn order to follow the world, etc.

original: 'jig rten rjes 'jug phyir zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten rjes su bskyang pa'i ched du'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten rjes 'jug phyir zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten rjes su bskyang pa'i ched du'o //
translated: means in order to care for the world.üîΩIn all dharmas, etc.

original: chos rnams kun la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gnas pa med ces bya ba ni phyi rol du ma gyur pa'o //
analyzed: chos rnams kun la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gnas pa med ces bya ba ni phyi rol du ma gyur pa'o //

original: rtag tu mnyam 'jog pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rtag tu mnyam 'jog pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The phrase always in meditative equipoise and so forth.

original: spyod lam dag ni zhes bya ba ni langs pa dang 'dug pa dang 'chag pa dang nyal ba la sogs pa thams cad du'o //
analyzed: spyod lam dag ni zhes bya ba ni langs pa dang 'dug pa dang 'chag pa dang nyal ba la sogs pa thams cad du'o //

original: rnam 'phrul zhing bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rnam 'phrul zhing bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The phrase in all emanations and actions and so forth.

original: rdzu 'phrul spros pa'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul spros pa'o //
translated: The phrase in all emanations refers to the emanations of magical power.

original: sgyu ma lta bu zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: The phrase like an illusion refers to the meditative absorption of self-consecration.

original: sna tshogs min la zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba rnams kyi dngos po gcig nyid du'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs min la zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba rnams kyi dngos po gcig nyid du'o //
translated: The phrase in the non-diverse refers to the single entity of all beings.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la kun mkhyen ye shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / de ltar 'jigs med gsol 'debs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la kun mkhyen ye shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / de ltar 'jigs med gsol 'debs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The phrase in that way and so forth, beginning with the wisdom of omniscience, and the phrase in that way, fearlessly supplicating, and so forth.

original: thos pas ni gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshig go //üîΩbdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: thos pas ni gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshig go // bdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The phrase through hearing refers to the words of supplication.üîΩThe phrase self-consecration and so forth.

original: rang gi rang bzhin byin gyis brlab pa ni bdag ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa ste /
analyzed: rang gi rang bzhin byin gyis brlab pa ni bdag ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa ste /
translated: The phrase self-consecration refers to the consecration of one's own nature.

original: rang gi sems tsam so sor snang ba'i lus so //
analyzed: rang gi sems tsam so sor snang ba'i lus so //
translated: The body is the appearance of one‚Äôs mind alone.

original: de'i rim pa ni rlung dang rnam par shes pa gsum yang dag par ldan pa ste /
analyzed: de'i rim pa ni rlung dang rnam par shes pa gsum yang dag par ldan pa ste /
translated: The process is the union of the three: wind, consciousness, and reality.

original: de nyid la bdag byin gyis brlab pa pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid la bdag byin gyis brlab pa pa zhes bya'o //
translated: That is called ‚Äúself-consecration.‚ÄùüîΩThe so-called conventional truth is the seeing of the conventional truth.

original: kun rdzob bden pa zhes bya ba ni de kun rdzob kyi bden pa mthong ba zhes bya ba brjod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob bden pa zhes bya ba ni de kun rdzob kyi bden pa mthong ba zhes bya ba brjod par bya ba'o //
translated: That is said to be

original: de ni bla ma'i drin dag gis //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de ni bla ma'i drin dag gis // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: through the kindness of the guru.

original: kun bdag @180b nyid ces bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: kun bdag @180b nyid ces bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: The so-called ‚Äúself-nature‚Äù is the nature of omniscience.

original: gtso bo zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba rnams so //
analyzed: gtso bo zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba rnams so //
translated: The so-called ‚Äúprincipal‚Äù is the world.

original: tshe 'di nyid du zhes bya ba ni tshe 'di nyid la'o //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid du zhes bya ba ni tshe 'di nyid la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn this very life‚Äù means in this very lifetime.

original: bdag byin brlabs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: bdag byin brlabs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In ‚Äúself-consecration,‚Äù and so on,

original: 'od gsal ba'i gnas zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba'i gnas zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
translated: the ‚Äústate of clear light‚Äù is the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: bden pa gnyis su bya ba ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i dbye ba'o //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis su bya ba ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i dbye ba'o //
translated: The ‚Äútwo truths‚Äù are the divisions of the conventional and the ultimate.

original: 'bras bu ni gong na med pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni gong na med pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: rgyu ni thabs kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: rgyu ni thabs kyi khyad par ro //

original: gang yang 'di rnal 'byor pa'i kun rdzob kyi gzugs so //
analyzed: gang yang 'di rnal 'byor pa'i kun rdzob kyi gzugs so //
translated: And this is the conventional form of the yogi.

original: kun rdzob gzhan gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i ngo bo yang yod pa de dag ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i sgras brjod par bya ba zhes bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: kun rdzob gzhan gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i ngo bo yang yod pa de dag ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i sgras brjod par bya ba zhes bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Those that are the nature of the cause of the transmission of one conventional [truth] after another are not to be expressed by the word 'self-consecration'.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: He says 'by the stage of self-consecration', etc.

original: gyis ni zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gyis ni zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: 'By' means 'because'.

original: rgyu gang gis rim bzhin du rjes thogs la /
analyzed: rgyu gang gis rim bzhin du rjes thogs la /
translated: By what cause, in what order, immediately

original: 'od gsal ba ni 'thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba ni 'thob par 'gyur //

original: zhes bya ba chos kyi sku 'thob pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba chos kyi sku 'thob pa'o //

original: rdo rje slob dpon zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa'i bla ma'o //
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa'i bla ma'o //

original: dang por zhes bya ba ni mchog tu gsang ba mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: dang por zhes bya ba ni mchog tu gsang ba mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: First, means the stage of manifest enlightenment, which is supremely secret.

original: rang dbang med pa zhes bya ba ni gtso bo ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: rang dbang med pa zhes bya ba ni gtso bo ma yin pa ste /
translated: Not independent means not primary.

original: brdzun pa dang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: brdzun pa dang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: Up to the nature of falsehood and illusion.

original: gang gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rang rgyud ni zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: rang rgyud ni zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: It is said: because of one's own continuum.

original: rang gi rang bzhin dang rang gi ngo bor 'byung ba ma yin zhing skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: rang gi rang bzhin dang rang gi ngo bor 'byung ba ma yin zhing skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: It does not arise, does not occur, as one's own nature, as one's own essence.

original: rang gi ngo bor skye pa dang bral ba'i phyir dang thug pa med pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bor skye pa dang bral ba'i phyir dang thug pa med pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning is that it is free from arising as one's own essence, and because the fault of infinite regress would ensue.

original: gal te 'gro ba sgyu ma'i rang bzhin yin 'byung ba'i rgyu ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'gro ba sgyu ma'i rang bzhin yin 'byung ba'i rgyu ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: If the world has the nature of illusion, what is the cause of its arising?

original: de'i rgyu ni 'od gsal zhes bya ba smras so //
analyzed: de'i rgyu ni 'od gsal zhes bya ba smras so //

original: de ltar na 'od gsal ba dngos po zhig tu 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na 'od gsal ba dngos po zhig tu 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: In that case, clear light would be a real entity.

original: 'od gsal thams cad stong pa'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal thams cad stong pa'o //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: Thus, it is said.üîΩüîΩ

original: de'i phyir khams gsum pa 'di dag thams cad stong pa las byung ba sems tsam yin gyis yang gtso bo dang dbang phyug la sogs pa ni med do /
analyzed: de'i phyir khams gsum pa 'di dag thams cad stong pa las byung ba sems tsam yin gyis yang gtso bo dang dbang phyug la sogs pa ni med do /
translated: Thus, all these three realms are mind-only, arising from emptiness. There is no primal substance, no God, etc.

original: sems gang gis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sems gang gis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúBy whatever mind‚Äù and so on.

original: byis pa zhes bya ba ni mu stegs can dang rnam par shes par smra pa ste /
analyzed: byis pa zhes bya ba ni mu stegs can dang rnam par shes par smra pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúFools‚Äù are the tƒ´rthikas and the Vij√±ƒÅnavƒÅdins.

original: rang gi ngo bor sgro 'dogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bor sgro 'dogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are fools because they superimpose a self-nature.

original: bcings zhes bya ba ni bcings pa thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bcings zhes bya ba ni bcings pa thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBound‚Äù means they attain bondage.

original: rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor @181a * //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor @181a * //

analyzed: pa'o ; / bde gshegs gnas ni lam ste thob par 'gyur ba'o //

original: 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni 'khor bar ro //
analyzed: 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni 'khor bar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúHere‚Äù means in sa·πÉsƒÅra.

analyzed: skye ba zhes bya ba ni bden ba'i dngos po 'ga' zhig ste bdag dang dbang phyug la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBirth‚Äù means some real thing that is true, such as a self, ƒ™≈õvara, and so on.

original: 'chi ba ni nyams par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba ni nyams par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúDeath‚Äù means their destruction.

original: de ltar na ci zhig mthong bar 'gyur zhen /
analyzed: de ltar na ci zhig mthong bar 'gyur zhen /
translated: Thus, what is seen?

original: sems nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: sems nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: He says, ‚Äúthe mind itself,‚Äù and so on.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam par 'dzin cing sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam par 'dzin cing sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par gnas pa'o //
translated: It apprehends the aspects of form, and so on, and abides in various aspects, which are of the nature of illusion.

original: de ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam pa 'dzin pa'i rang sems thabs gang gis rtogs par 'gyur ba de bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩrlung gi sbyor ba med par ni //
analyzed: de ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam pa 'dzin pa'i rang sems thabs gang gis rtogs par 'gyur ba de bstan pa'i phyir / rlung gi sbyor ba med par ni //
translated: In order to demonstrate by what means one realizes one‚Äôs own mind, which apprehends the aspects of form, and so on, he says,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /üîΩsems kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / sems kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚Äúwithout the yoga of the vƒÅyu,‚Äù and so on.üîΩIn the section beginning with ‚Äúthe nature of the mind,‚Äù

original: sems kyi rang bzhin rgyur gyur pas //
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin rgyur gyur pas //
translated: ‚Äúthe nature of the mind‚Äù is the cause.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin brgya drug cu rgyur gyur pa las /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin brgya drug cu rgyur gyur pa las /
translated: The nature of the mind is the cause of the one hundred and sixty natures.

original: las dang skye ba kun du 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: las dang skye ba kun du 'byung ba ste /
translated: From that, karma and birth arise.

original: kun nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: kun nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: They arise completely.

original: de nyid ces bya ba rnam par shes pa gsum mo //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba rnam par shes pa gsum mo //
translated: ‚ÄúThat itself‚Äù is the three consciousnesses.

analyzed: rlung dang yang dag par ldan pa las 'byung bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They arise from being generated by being conjoined with the vƒÅyu.

analyzed: rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: The ‚Äúyogin‚Äù is the perfect yogin.

original: lus su zhes bya ba ni lha la sogs pa'i gzugs can gyi gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba'i lus so //
analyzed: lus su zhes bya ba ni lha la sogs pa'i gzugs can gyi gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba'i lus so //
translated: ‚Äú Body‚Äù means the body that is like an image of a deity, etc.

original: sgyu ma'i lus zhes bya ba'i sgras kyang de la brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i lus zhes bya ba'i sgras kyang de la brjod pa yin no //
translated: The term ‚Äúillusory body‚Äù also refers to that.

analyzed: de bas 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni rlung dang rnam shes ldan pa nyid kyis so //
translated: ‚Äú Therefore‚Äù means by the possession of wind and consciousness.

original: 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa'i 'gro ba dang snod kyi sgras brjod pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa'i 'gro ba dang snod kyi sgras brjod pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú World‚Äù means the world of the three realms, and the term ‚Äúvessel‚Äù refers to it.

original: rgyu de'i phyir sgyu ma lta bur 'dir bshad do //
analyzed: rgyu de'i phyir sgyu ma lta bur 'dir bshad do //
translated: For that reason, it is explained as being like an illusion.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'dir te /
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'dir te /
translated: ‚Äú Here‚Äù means in this teaching of the Buddha.

original: mthun pa'i rgyu las mthun pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so //üîΩsgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gnas //
analyzed: mthun pa'i rgyu las mthun pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so // sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gnas //
translated: It is by the principle that a concordant effect arises from a concordant cause.üîΩ‚Äú Abides in the illusion-like meditative stabilization‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: means the yogin who abides in the meditative stabilization of self-consecration.

original: thams cad ces bya ba ni snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad do //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad do //
translated: ‚ÄúEverything‚Äù means the entire world of the environment.

original: de dang 'dra bar zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma'i rnam par ro //
analyzed: de dang 'dra bar zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma'i rnam par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúLike that‚Äù means like an illusion.

original: de nyid ni gzugs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs te /
analyzed: de nyid ni gzugs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs te /
translated: That is stated by ‚Äúform, etc.‚Äù

original: khams ni zhes bya ba ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung ngo //
analyzed: khams ni zhes bya ba ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúElements‚Äù means earth, water, fire, and wind.

original: mig la sogs dang zhes bya ba ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid do //
analyzed: mig la sogs dang zhes bya ba ni mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid do //
translated: ‚ÄúEyes, etc.‚Äù means eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind.

original: yul rnams ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang chos zhes bya bar grags pa'o //
analyzed: yul rnams ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang chos zhes bya bar grags pa'o //
translated: The objects are known as form, sound, smell, taste, touch, and mental objects.

original: ye shes lnga po zhes bya ba ni me long lta bu dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / so sor rtog pa dang / bya ba grub pa dang / chos kyi dbyings shin tu @181b rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes lnga po zhes bya ba ni me long lta bu dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / so sor rtog pa dang / bya ba grub pa dang / chos kyi dbyings shin tu @181b rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The ‚Äúfive intuitions‚Äù are the mirror intuition, the equalizing intuition, the distinguishing intuition, the accomplishing intuition, and the intuition of the perfectly pure realm of reality.

original: nang du zhes bya ba ni khams bco brgyad do //
analyzed: nang du zhes bya ba ni khams bco brgyad do //
translated: ‚ÄúInternally‚Äù means the eighteen elements.

original: phyi dang zhes bya ba ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: phyi dang zhes bya ba ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúExternally‚Äù means the animate and inanimate.

original: thams cad ces bya ba ni sgyu ma nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni sgyu ma nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The word all means the illusion itself.

original: da ni rnal 'byor pa'i rang gi sems kyi gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo sgyu ma'i lus ngag byin gyis brlab pa'i zhes bya ba'i ming can gyi rang gi ngo bo dang kha dog dang khyab pa bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir me long nang gi gzugs brnyan lta bu
analyzed: da ni rnal 'byor pa'i rang gi sems kyi gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo sgyu ma'i lus ngag byin gyis brlab pa'i zhes bya ba'i ming can gyi rang gi ngo bo dang kha dog dang khyab pa bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir me long nang gi gzugs brnyan lta bu
translated: Now, in order to establish the nature, color, and pervasion of the illusory body, which is the reflection of the yogin's own mind, and which is called the consecration of body and speech, he says:üîΩLike a reflection in a mirror.

original: zhes bya ba smras te gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba smras te gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: Like a reflection.

original: mtshon par bya ba zhes bya ba ni mdun na 'dug pa'i gzugs brnyan mthong bas so //
analyzed: mtshon par bya ba zhes bya ba ni mdun na 'dug pa'i gzugs brnyan mthong bas so //
translated: The word to be reflected means to be seen as a reflection in front.

original: 'ja' lta bu zhes bya ba ni ji ltar dbang po'i gzhu 'od zer kha dog rnam lnga dang ldan par 'byung ba de bzhin du de'i kha dog mtshon par bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'ja' lta bu zhes bya ba ni ji ltar dbang po'i gzhu 'od zer kha dog rnam lnga dang ldan par 'byung ba de bzhin du de'i kha dog mtshon par bya ba'o //
translated: Like a rainbow. Just as a rainbow appears with the five colored rays, so its color is to be reflected.

original: khyab pa nyid ni chu'i zla bas mtshon par bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyab pa nyid ni chu'i zla bas mtshon par bya ba'i don to //
translated: Pervasion is to be reflected by the moon in water.

analyzed: da ni rnal 'byor la ma ltos par yang de gsal bar rtog par byed pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir / me long dri ma med pa la //
translated: Now, in order to teach the clear realization of that without relying on yoga,üîΩhe says, ‚ÄúIn a stainless mirror,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /üîΩdngos dang dngos med las grol bas //üîΩzhes bya ba ni bden pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / dngos dang dngos med las grol bas // zhes bya ba ni bden pa yang ma yin /

original: brdzun ba yang ma yin no //

original: legs bris pa zhes bya ba ni kha dog dang dbyibs sna tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: legs bris pa zhes bya ba ni kha dog dang dbyibs sna tshogs pa'o //

original: zhes bya ba ste /

analyzed: nyams pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //

analyzed: bstan zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi dper gyur pas nang gi dpes bstan par bya ba rab tu bstan pa yin no //

analyzed: slob ma bzang po zhes bya ba ni rin po che lta bu'i gang zag go //
translated: ‚ÄúGood disciple‚Äù means a person who is like a jewel.

analyzed: 'di nyid ces bya ba ni gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: nges par mtshon pa ste zhes bya ba ni yang dag par mtshon par bya ba'o //

analyzed: sku zhes bya ba ni de kho na zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: rdo rje'i sku zhes bya ba ni mi tshig mi chod mi phyed mi 'bangs pa'i gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang / de bas zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang / de bas zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'o //

original: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni rang nyid do //
analyzed: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni rang nyid do //

analyzed: mchod ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'o //

original: gang gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhe na /

original: bdag nyid sangs rgyas @182a * //
analyzed: bdag nyid sangs rgyas @182a * //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /

original: lha rnams ni lha nyid do //

original: de rnams kyi ngo bo ni lha nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams kyi ngo bo ni lha nyid do //

original: de bas zhes bya ba ni rgyu des so //
analyzed: de bas zhes bya ba ni rgyu des so //

original: sngags dang phyag rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: dkyil 'khor la sogs zhes bya ba ni bzlas pa dang bsam gtan dang mchod pa la sogs pa'o //

original: dbang po'i gzhu zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma'i dpe nyid du nye bar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: dbang po'i gzhu zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma'i dpe nyid du nye bar bstan pa yin no //

analyzed: sgyu rtsal zhes bya ba ni sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi ste /

original: bha ra ta'i bstan bcos las bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bha ra ta'i bstan bcos las bstan pa'o //

original: mang du bshad ci dgos zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mang du bshad ci dgos zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: rdo rje theg pa zhes bya ba ni gsang sngags kyi theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa zhes bya ba ni gsang sngags kyi theg pa chen po'o //

original: da ni sgyu ma'i dpe nyid kyi dmigs pa bstan pa'i phyir me long gi ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: da ni sgyu ma'i dpe nyid kyi dmigs pa bstan pa'i phyir me long gi ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /

original: sgyu ma ni sprul pa'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma ni sprul pa'o //

original: chu bur zhes bya ba ni chu'i chu bur ro //
analyzed: chu bur zhes bya ba ni chu'i chu bur ro //

analyzed: mig 'phrul zhes bya ba ni sngags dang sman la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: mthong ba dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dmigs med ces bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: dmigs par bya bas ni dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: dmigs par bya bas ni dmigs pa ste /

original: mig la sogs pas gzung bar bya ba'i yul lo //
analyzed: mig la sogs pas gzung bar bya ba'i yul lo //

original: kun rdzob ces bya ba ni tha snyad tsam du rdo rje theg pa las sgyu ma zhes brjod pas sgyu ma dang 'dra bar yongs su brtags pa'o //

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / dbang po gang dang gang lam 'gyur //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /

analyzed: gyur zhes bya ba ni der song ba'o //

original: de dang zhes bya ba ni dngos po de'o //
analyzed: de dang zhes bya ba ni dngos po de'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to that entity.

original: de ngo bor bya zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin de'i ngo bo nyid de ji srid sgyu ma lta bur mthong gi bar du'o //

translated: ‚ÄúOne should make it one‚Äôs own nature‚Äù means ‚Äúone should make it one‚Äôs own nature of the meditative concentration of self-consecration, as long as one sees it as illusion-like.‚Äù

original: rgyu de'i phyir /üîΩmnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rgyu de'i phyir / mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis //
translated: For that reason,

original: zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smras te /

original: ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i gnas skabs su'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i gnas skabs su'o //

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na /

analyzed: kun la zhes bya ba ni thams cad la'o //

analyzed: kun nas zhes bya @182b ba ni thams cad nas so // thams cad du zhes bya ba ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'o //

analyzed: rnam pa kun zhes bya ba ni mnyam par gzhag pa dang ma bzhag pa'i gnas skabs so //

original: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni rang nyid do //
analyzed: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni rang nyid do //

analyzed: sems dpa' chen po 'gro dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /

analyzed: gnas zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i 'dug gnas so //

original: 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba gtso bo rnams kyi'o // lha dang bcas pa kun gyis mchod //

analyzed: ces bya ba ni lha rnams kyis so // ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas 'gro ba skyob pa bstan pa'i phyir //

analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa yin te /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu nyid du'o //

analyzed: sna tshogs ye shes bya ba ni 'gro ba rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo yongs su shes pa ste /

analyzed: sems tsam gyi ye shes sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin no //

analyzed: ji yang med ces bya ba la sogs pa la bsgrub par mi bya ba ste 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi ngo bo'o //

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas so //

original: brgyan pas zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlab pa'o //
analyzed: brgyan pas zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlab pa'o //

original: de nyid kyi phyir rang nyid ces bya ba smras te /

original: bde chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni las dang dam tshig dang chos dang phyag rgya chen po'o //

analyzed: bde chen zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i 'bras bu ster ba'o ;

analyzed: / da ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa bstan pa'i phyir /

original: lus ni gzugs phung ngo //

original: smig rgyu rmi lam lta bu de //
analyzed: smig rgyu rmi lam lta bu de //

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / 'di 'dra'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: kun rdzob la zhes bya ba ni yongs su gsal bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas so //

analyzed: nye bar dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bor mngon par brtags pa nyid do // skye @183a * //

original: ba ni 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: ba ni 'byung ba'o //

original: de dag ces bya ba ni nad de dag go //
analyzed: de dag ces bya ba ni nad de dag go //

analyzed: sman zhes bya ba ni rtsi'o //

analyzed: mchod pa thams cad spangs nas ni // zhes bya ba'o //

original: de zhes bya ba ni bla ma de'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni bla ma de'o //
