original: de zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: The it is the samadhi of self-consecration.

original: gal te ji ltar na bsod nams kyi rgyu gzhan dag la mchod pa la sogs pa spangs nas bla ma kho na la mchod pa bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ji ltar na bsod nams kyi rgyu gzhan dag la mchod pa la sogs pa spangs nas bla ma kho na la mchod pa bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, How is it that, having abandoned other causes of merit such as worship, one should worship only the guru?

original: de yis bsod nams ma byas ci //
analyzed: de yis bsod nams ma byas ci //
translated: It is said, What merit has he not created?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te ;
translated: and so forth.

original: bla med ces byed ba zhes bya ba ni lam bla na med pa ster ba'o //
analyzed: bla med ces byed ba zhes bya ba ni lam bla na med pa ster ba'o //
translated: The unsurpassed is the one who bestows the unsurpassed path.

original: slob dpon nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: slob dpon nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: The master is Vajrasattva.

original: ji lta bu'i mchod pa bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu'i mchod pa bya zhe na /
translated: What kind of worship is to be performed?

original: shin tu dga' ba gang dang gang //
analyzed: shin tu dga' ba gang dang gang //
translated: Whatever is very delightful,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: and so on.

original: de ltar byas pa la yon tan ci zhig yod ce na /üîΩslob dpon gyis ni sdig pa 'phrog / ces bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: de ltar byas pa la yon tan ci zhig yod ce na / slob dpon gyis ni sdig pa 'phrog / ces bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: What is the good of doing it that way?üîΩThe master removes sin,üîΩand so on. The master removes from the fearful ocean of suffering,

original: slob dpon gyis ni sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho 'jigs las zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'o //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis ni sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho 'jigs las zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'o //
translated: that is, from the ocean of cyclic existence.

original: da ni slob ma ngan pa la bstan par bya ba ma yin zhes dgag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni slob ma ngan pa la bstan par bya ba ma yin zhes dgag pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to prohibit the teaching to bad disciples,

original: gang zhig nga rgyal gyis rtsags  shing //
analyzed: gang zhig nga rgyal gyis rtsags  shing //
translated: he says, He who is puffed up with pride,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: and so on.

original: yang dag rim pa sun 'byin pa //
analyzed: yang dag rim pa sun 'byin pa //
translated: He who is a reviler of the right order,

original: zhes bya ba ni rim pa lnga sun 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rim pa lnga sun 'byin pa'o //
translated: that is, a reviler of the five stages.

original: slob ma bzang po'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni /
analyzed: slob ma bzang po'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni /
translated: The characteristics of a good disciple are taught:

original: bla ma la gus zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bla ma la gus zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: He who has faith in the guru, and so on.

original: bden par smra zhes bya ba ni bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bden par smra zhes bya ba ni bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He who speaks the truth means he who has true speech.

original: rnam par dben zhing zhes bya ba ni gcig pu dga' ba'i ngang tshul can no //
analyzed: rnam par dben zhing zhes bya ba ni gcig pu dga' ba'i ngang tshul can no //
translated: Solitary means having the nature of delighting in solitude.

original: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i dka' 'grel lo /
analyzed: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i dka' 'grel lo /
translated: The Commentary on the Difficult Points of the Stages of Self-Consecration.

original: // / rim pa bzhi pa reg gyur nas //
analyzed: // / rim pa bzhi pa reg gyur nas //
translated: Having reached the fourth stage,

original: 'gro ba'i mun pa 'phrog mdzad cing //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i mun pa 'phrog mdzad cing //
translated: you steal away the darkness of the world

original: sna tshogs don mdzad klu sgrub la //
analyzed: sna tshogs don mdzad klu sgrub la //
translated: and accomplish various benefits.üîΩI pay homage to NƒÅgƒÅrjuna,

original: phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I bow down and pay homage.

original: slob dpon gyi rim pa bzhi pa'i don rab tu bsgrub par 'dod nas /
analyzed: slob dpon gyi rim pa bzhi pa'i don rab tu bsgrub par 'dod nas /
translated: Desiring to fully accomplish the meaning of the four stages of the master,

original: dang po nyid du rje btsun rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dang po nyid du rje btsun rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: first of all, paying homage to the venerable Vajradhara is expressed by to Vajrasattva and so forth.

original: thams cad stong pa nyid ni 'od gsal ba ste de ston par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad stong pa nyid ni 'od gsal ba ste de ston par mdzad pa'o //
translated: All-empty is clear light, and he is the teacher of that.

original: mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gang gis sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gang gis sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'o //
translated: Manifest enlightenment means having manifestly and completely attained buddhahood, by which buddhahood is attained.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni mngon par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid can 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni mngon par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid can 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: This means the clear light, which has the characteristic of manifest enlightenment.

original: rang nyid 'byung bar 'gyur ba nas rang 'byung ste /
analyzed: rang nyid 'byung bar 'gyur ba nas rang 'byung ste /
translated: It arises by itself, and is self-arisen.

original: @183b rgyu gang gis kyang ma bskyed ces bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: @183b rgyu gang gis kyang ma bskyed ces bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: It is not produced by any cause.üîΩTherefore, it is said:

original: de'i phyir / blo yi spyod yul min phyir ngag gis brjod du med //
analyzed: de'i phyir / blo yi spyod yul min phyir ngag gis brjod du med //
translated: It is not the domain of the intellect, and cannot be expressed by speech.

original: bla mas bstan pas dngos po rtogs par bya ba las ring gyur //
analyzed: bla mas bstan pas dngos po rtogs par bya ba las ring gyur //
translated: It is far from being realized by means of an entity taught by a guru.

original: snying rje la sogs yon tan dkar po'i de nyid ma yin pas //
analyzed: snying rje la sogs yon tan dkar po'i de nyid ma yin pas //
translated: It is not the reality of good qualities such as compassion.

original: dad dang ldan pa'i snying gi gnas su rang nyid 'byung ba yin //
analyzed: dad dang ldan pa'i snying gi gnas su rang nyid 'byung ba yin //
translated: It arises by itself in the heart of one who has faith.

original: zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the teaching.

original: bcom ldan zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: bcom ldan zhes bya ba ni //
translated: Bhagavat means

original: dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang ye shes dang // brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa ste //üîΩdrug po de la ldan zhes bya //
analyzed: dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang ye shes dang // brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa ste // drug po de la ldan zhes bya //
translated: Lord, good form, glory, fame, knowledge, and perfect effort.üîΩThese six are called the perfections.

original: zhes 'byung bas de gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes 'byung bas de gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: He who has them is called that.

original: gcig bu zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'o //
analyzed: gcig bu zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'o //
translated: Solitary means non-dual.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos sku'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir dang sna tshogs dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos sku'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir dang sna tshogs dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the essence of the Dharma Body of all Buddhas, and because it is not endowed with variety.

original: bdag nyid che ba'i lha zhes bya ba ni gtso bor gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid che ba'i lha zhes bya ba ni gtso bor gyur pa'o //
translated: The great deity is the principal one.

original: man ngag ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: man ngag ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With regard to instruction, etc.,

original: de bas lhag ces bya ba ni mchog tu phan pa mdzad pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde bas zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba bas kyang ngo //
analyzed: de bas lhag ces bya ba ni mchog tu phan pa mdzad pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // de bas zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba bas kyang ngo //
translated: Superior to that means that it is the highest benefit.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni bla ma'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni bla ma'o //
translated: That means than that.

original: ci nus pa zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi nus pas so //
analyzed: ci nus pa zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi nus pas so //
translated: One should honor the guru to the best of one's ability, according to one's own capacity.

original: ci 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni bcu drug lon pa'am gzhan dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: ci 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni bcu drug lon pa'am gzhan dag kyang ngo //
translated: One should honor him with whatever one has, with sixteen year olds or others.

original: dga' ba dang mgu ba bskyed pas na phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: dga' ba dang mgu ba bskyed pas na phyag rgya'o //
translated: The seal is the generation of joy and satisfaction.

original: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su'o //
analyzed: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su'o //
translated: In the middle of the assembly circle, etc. means in the middle of the assembly circle.

original: mchod par bya ba ni rdo rje slob dpon la'o //
analyzed: mchod par bya ba ni rdo rje slob dpon la'o //
translated: The one to be worshipped is the vajra master.

original: mchod pa ni nang gi bdag nyid can gyi mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: mchod pa ni nang gi bdag nyid can gyi mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The worship is of the nature of the inner.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rnal 'byor chen po ni rdo rje slob dpon no //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rnal 'byor chen po ni rdo rje slob dpon no //
translated: Then, etc. The great yoga is the vajra master.

original: snang ba zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma bzhi nye bar mtshon par byed pa'o //
analyzed: snang ba zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma bzhi nye bar mtshon par byed pa'o //
translated: The appearance is the indication of the four moments.

original: snyoms par 'jug ba zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi phyag rgya dang ngo //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug ba zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi phyag rgya dang ngo //
translated: The union is with the external seal.

original: cho ga yis zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdus pa'i rim par bstan pa'i cho gas so //üîΩka la sha sogs zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i steng du dung chos sam /
analyzed: cho ga yis zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdus pa'i rim par bstan pa'i cho gas so // ka la sha sogs zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i steng du dung chos sam /
translated: By the rite is by the rite taught in the concise stage.

original: nya phyis kha sbyor du byas par gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: nya phyis kha sbyor du byas par gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Kala≈õa, etc. means that a conch or an oyster shell should be placed on top of the vase.

original: nam phyed ces bya ba ni nam phyed kyi dus su'o //
analyzed: nam phyed ces bya ba ni nam phyed kyi dus su'o //
translated: At midnight is at the time of midnight.

original: dbang bskur yang dag thob nas zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i cho gas dbang bskur ba rnam pa gnyis thob pa'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur yang dag thob nas zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i cho gas dbang bskur ba rnam pa gnyis thob pa'o //
translated: Having obtained the perfect consecration means having obtained the two kinds of consecration, the consecration of the secret consecration ritual and the consecration of the wisdom-knowledge consecration ritual.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni zhag gzhan la'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni zhag gzhan la'o //
translated: Again means on another day.

original: bstod pas zhes bya bas ni 'chad par 'gyur bas so //
analyzed: bstod pas zhes bya bas ni 'chad par 'gyur bas so //
translated: By praise is meant as will be explained.

original: khams gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'od gsal ba'i yon tan brjod pa'i sgo nas bla ma la mnyes par byed do //
analyzed: khams gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'od gsal ba'i yon tan brjod pa'i sgo nas bla ma la mnyes par byed do //
translated: By the three realms and so forth, the guru is pleased by the expression of the virtues of clear light.

original: mi brten zhes bya ba ni phyi rol @184a * //üîΩdu ma gyur pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mi brten zhes bya ba ni phyi rol @184a * // du ma gyur pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Not dependent means not become external.

original: phung po dang khams dang skye mched du ma gyur pa'o //
analyzed: phung po dang khams dang skye mched du ma gyur pa'o //
translated: Not become means not become the aggregates, elements, and sense bases.

original: de ltar na gang la bstod pa dang khyad ci yod ce na /üîΩphyin ci log las rnam grol ba //
analyzed: de ltar na gang la bstod pa dang khyad ci yod ce na / phyin ci log las rnam grol ba //
translated: Thus, what is the difference between that and praise?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: Liberated from error and so forth is said.

original: rnam rtog med cing zhes bya ba'i ched du bsam pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam rtog med cing zhes bya ba'i ched du bsam pa med pa'o //
translated: Without conceptuality means without deliberate thought.

original: kun rtog med pa gang la 'jug pa'i kun du rtog pa med pa ni kun rtog med ces bya'o //
analyzed: kun rtog med pa gang la 'jug pa'i kun du rtog pa med pa ni kun rtog med ces bya'o //
translated: The absence of conceptualization in regard to the absence of conceptualization is described as the absence of conceptualization.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For this very reason,

original: yid ni rab tu mi gnas pa //üîΩzhes bya ste /
analyzed: yid ni rab tu mi gnas pa // zhes bya ste /
translated: the mind is not firmly placed.

original: gang la bsam pa yod pa ma yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: gang la bsam pa yod pa ma yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: That which is not thought is described in this way.

original: yid ni yid kyi rnam rtog go //
analyzed: yid ni yid kyi rnam rtog go //
translated: The mind is the conceptualization of the mind.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dmigs med do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dmigs med do //
translated: For this very reason, it is without objective support.

original: gnas med ces bya ba la sogs pa la gos pa ni 'dod chags so //
analyzed: gnas med ces bya ba la sogs pa la gos pa ni 'dod chags so //
translated: In regard to the absence of a basis and so on, attachment is defilement.

original: gos pa dang bral ba ni gos pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gos pa dang bral ba ni gos pa med pa'o //
translated: The absence of defilement is the absence of attachment.üîΩThe request is made again after the request:

original: lta bar 'tshal zhes bya ba ni bskul nas yang gsol ba gdab po //üîΩbdag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: lta bar 'tshal zhes bya ba ni bskul nas yang gsol ba gdab po // bdag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: I wish to see.üîΩIn regard to the seeing and so on,

original: mthong bar ni zhes bya ba ni 'dis mthong bar byed pas na mthong ba ste thabs so //
analyzed: mthong bar ni zhes bya ba ni 'dis mthong bar byed pas na mthong ba ste thabs so //
translated: seeing is the means by which one sees.

original: snang ba gsum po zhes bya ba'i rnam par shes pa gsum po spangs pa'o //
analyzed: snang ba gsum po zhes bya ba'i rnam par shes pa gsum po spangs pa'o //
translated: The three appearances are the three consciousnesses.

original: rdo rjes shes zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: rdo rjes shes zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba'i ye shes so //
translated: The knowledge of the vajra is the knowledge of clear light.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The statement ‚Äúthe pristine wisdom of all buddhas‚Äù refers to the essence of the Dharma Body of all the TathƒÅgatas.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /üîΩde bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
translated: And for that very reason,

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: the statement ‚Äúthe abode of all TathƒÅgatas‚Äù

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku'i gnas kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku'i gnas kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: refers to the essence of the abode of the Enjoyment Body and the Emanation Body of all the TathƒÅgatas.

original: thog mtha' med pa ni skye ba dang 'jig pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: thog mtha' med pa ni skye ba dang 'jig pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is without beginning or end because it is free from arising and cessation.

original: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir zhi ba'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir zhi ba'o //
translated: It is peace because it is free from the afflictions and secondary afflictions.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Thus, etc.

original: rim pa ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: rim pa ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The stages are the stages of manifest enlightenment.

original: mtshan mo snang ba'i cha zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ni phyi rol gyi sgo nas nang gi bdag nyid can ston par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mtshan mo snang ba'i cha zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ni phyi rol gyi sgo nas nang gi bdag nyid can ston par byed pa yin no //
translated: The statement ‚Äúthe part of the night that is light‚Äù and so forth teaches the inner nature by way of the outer.

original: mtshan mo'i cha zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo'i dus su'o //
analyzed: mtshan mo'i cha zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo'i dus su'o //
translated: The part of the night is the time of night.

original: gsal ba'i nyi ma'i zer 'gyed ces bya ba ni nyi ma 'char ba nas brtsams nas so //üîΩyin zhes bya ba ni snang ba mched pa 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: gsal ba'i nyi ma'i zer 'gyed ces bya ba ni nyi ma 'char ba nas brtsams nas so // yin zhes bya ba ni snang ba mched pa 'byung ba'o //
translated: The rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.üîΩThe rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.üîΩThe rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.üîΩThe rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.üîΩThe rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.üîΩThe rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.üîΩThe rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.üîΩThe rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.üîΩThe rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.

original: mtshams zhes bya ba ni mtshams kyi mun pa'i dus te /üîΩsnang ba nye bar thob pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: mtshams zhes bya ba ni mtshams kyi mun pa'i dus te / snang ba nye bar thob pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.üîΩThe rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.

original: rang gi rang bzhin brgya drug cu'o //
analyzed: rang gi rang bzhin brgya drug cu'o //
translated: The rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.

original: lan cig mun pa zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma so sor ro //
analyzed: lan cig mun pa zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma so sor ro //
translated: The rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.

original: rang gi zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi'o //üîΩde nyid kyi phyir de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dren par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi'o // de nyid kyi phyir de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dren par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.üîΩThe rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.üîΩThe rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.üîΩThe rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.üîΩThe rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.

original: 'o na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dren par byed ba gang yin zhe na mtshan @184b min zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /üîΩgang zhig ces bya ba ni bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: 'o na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dren par byed ba gang yin zhe na mtshan @184b min zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te / gang zhig ces bya ba ni bzhi pa'o //
translated: The rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.üîΩThe rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.üîΩThe rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.

original: de ni yin zhes bya ba ni de yin par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de ni yin zhes bya ba ni de yin par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The rays of the shining sun are the rays of the sun that shine forth beginning with sunrise.üîΩThe rays of the

original: bla ma mchog bshad ces bya ba ni rdo rje slob dpon rje btsun rdo rje 'chang gis bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma mchog bshad ces bya ba ni rdo rje slob dpon rje btsun rdo rje 'chang gis bstan pa'o //
translated: The supreme teacher is the Vajra Master, the venerable Vajradhara.

original: rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: The yogi is the yogi of self-consecration.

original: skad cig ma bzhi pa gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: skad cig ma bzhi pa gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to clarify the fourth instant,

original: mun pa'i mtha' ni zad dang zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo zad par gyur cing mun pa zad par gyur ba'o //
analyzed: mun pa'i mtha' ni zad dang zhes bya ba ni mtshan mo zad par gyur cing mun pa zad par gyur ba'o //
translated: the end of darkness is the end of night, the end of darkness.

original: 'das pa ni bral bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'das pa ni bral bar gyur pa'o //
translated: The past is the separation.

original: mtshams kyi snang ba ni mtshams kyi mun pa'o //
analyzed: mtshams kyi snang ba ni mtshams kyi mun pa'o //
translated: The light of the horizon is the darkness of the horizon.

original: nyi ma ni nyi ma nyid do //
analyzed: nyi ma ni nyi ma nyid do //
translated: The sun is the sun itself.

original: ji srid ces bya ba ni dang por nyi ma 'char ba'i gnas skabs so //
analyzed: ji srid ces bya ba ni dang por nyi ma 'char ba'i gnas skabs so //
translated: As long as is the state of the sun rising at first.

original: skad cig 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni skad cig la'o //
analyzed: skad cig 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni skad cig la'o //
translated: In this instant is in an instant.

original: bshad ces bya ba ni bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bshad ces bya ba ni bstan pa'o //
translated: The explanation is the teaching.

original: slob dpon mchog ces bya ba ni slob dpon thams cad kyi nang na gtso bor gyur ba'o //
analyzed: slob dpon mchog ces bya ba ni slob dpon thams cad kyi nang na gtso bor gyur ba'o //
translated: The supreme master is the chief of all masters.

original: phyi rol byang chub bstan pa ni dpe ste /
analyzed: phyi rol byang chub bstan pa ni dpe ste /
translated: The external teaching of enlightenment is the example.

original: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas kyang skad cig ma 'di la rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du mdzad do zhes bya ba 'dis ni phyi'i rdzogs par byang chub pa'i dpes bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas kyang skad cig ma 'di la rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du mdzad do zhes bya ba 'dis ni phyi'i rdzogs par byang chub pa'i dpes bstan pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One, the Sage of the Sakyas, in this very instant, has realized the vajra-like samadhi. This is the outer analogy of perfect enlightenment.

original: nang gi bde brnyog bral thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: nang gi bde brnyog bral thob par 'gyur //
translated: One attains the inner bliss, free from defilement.

original: zhes bya ba ni nang gi 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nang gi 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: This is the inner [enlightenment], characterized by clear light.

original: de nyid ni rgyu la 'bras bu brtags nas sangs rgyas byang chub ces bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni rgyu la 'bras bu brtags nas sangs rgyas byang chub ces bya ste /
translated: That very [enlightenment] is figuratively called buddhahood in relation to its cause,

original: skad cig de la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: skad cig de la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: meaning in that very instant.

original: skad cig de'i rang gi ngo bo bstan par bya ba'i phyir thog mar 'byung min zhes bya ba smras te ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig de'i rang gi ngo bo bstan par bya ba'i phyir thog mar 'byung min zhes bya ba smras te ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to show the nature of that instant, it is said not arisen in the beginning, because it is unborn.

original: yang na chos thams cad kyi thog mar 'byung ba ni rgyur gyur pa ste /
analyzed: yang na chos thams cad kyi thog mar 'byung ba ni rgyur gyur pa ste /
translated: Or, the arising in the beginning of all phenomena is the cause,

original: chos thams cad de las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad de las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because all phenomena arise from that.

original: dbus su 'byung min zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbus su 'byung min zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In the middle, there is no arising means that it is free from the characteristics of all phenomena.

original: dbus su 'byung ba yang yin te chos thams cad las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbus su 'byung ba yang yin te chos thams cad las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There is arising in the middle because it transcends all phenomena.

original: gang las mthar ma byung ba yod pa ma yin pa de ni mthar ni mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gang las mthar ma byung ba yod pa ma yin pa de ni mthar ni mi 'byung ngo //
translated: Where there is no arising of an end, there is no arising of an end.

original: yang na chos thams cad kyi mtha' zhes bya ba zad par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: yang na chos thams cad kyi mtha' zhes bya ba zad par gyur pa ste /
translated: Or, the end of all phenomena is exhaustion.

original: chos thams cad kyi mtha' 'od gsal ba'i mthar thug par 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi mtha' 'od gsal ba'i mthar thug par 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The end of all phenomena is the ultimate clear light.

original: de dag ces bya ba ni de lta bur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de dag ces bya ba ni de lta bur gyur pa'o //
translated: Those means those that are like that.

original: 'gro ba dang ni 'ong med ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'gro ba dang ni 'ong med ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: There is no coming or going, etc.

original: ngo mtshar zhes bya ba ni shin tu rmad du byung ba'o //
analyzed: ngo mtshar zhes bya ba ni shin tu rmad du byung ba'o //
translated: Amazing means extremely marvelous.

original: yang na 'dir ngo mtshar ci zhig yod ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: yang na 'dir ngo mtshar ci zhig yod ces bya ba ste /
translated: Or, what is amazing here?

original: brtags pa thams cad dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid can stong pa la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: brtags pa thams cad dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid can stong pa la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is emptiness, which is characterized by being free from all conceptual elaborations.

original: gnas par 'gyur min zhes bya ba ni gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med pa'o //
analyzed: gnas par 'gyur min zhes bya ba ni gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt does not abide‚Äù means that it does not abide anywhere.

original: myur du 'gro ba min zhes bya ba ni gar yang 'gro ba'i dang tshul can ma yin @185a* //
analyzed: myur du 'gro ba min zhes bya ba ni gar yang 'gro ba'i dang tshul can ma yin @185a* //
translated: ‚ÄúIt does not go quickly‚Äù means that it does not have the mode of going anywhere.

original: pa'o // mchog gyur pa ni gtso bor 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: pa'o // mchog gyur pa ni gtso bor 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt becomes supreme‚Äù means that it becomes the foremost.

original: de lta bu 'di nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de lta bu 'di nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúThis very suchness‚Äù and so on.

original: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i zhes bya ba ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: rgyu dang mi rgyu'i zhes bya ba ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúMotile and unmotile‚Äù means the nature of the animate and inanimate.

original: kun rgyu zhes bya ba ni sa stengs ma lus par 'khor ba'o //
analyzed: kun rgyu zhes bya ba ni sa stengs ma lus par 'khor ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIt wanders‚Äù means that it circles the entire surface of the earth.

original: rnal 'byor pa de ni mi zad pa zhes bya ba chos kyi sku thob pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa de ni mi zad pa zhes bya ba chos kyi sku thob pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat yogin‚Äù is one who has attained the dharmakƒÅya.

original: yon po'i lus ni dman pa'i 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: yon po'i lus ni dman pa'i 'gro ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe crooked body‚Äù is an inferior rebirth.

original: bstan pa la gnas med ces bya ba ni bstan la mi 'dug na yang ngo //üîΩmig btsums zhes bya ba ni mig ma phye ba yang ngo //
analyzed: bstan pa la gnas med ces bya ba ni bstan la mi 'dug na yang ngo // mig btsums zhes bya ba ni mig ma phye ba yang ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúIt does not abide in the teachings‚Äù means that it does not sit in the teachings.üîΩ‚ÄúThe closed eye‚Äù is the unopened eye.

original: rnam rgyas mig ni rnam par gnas par gyur pa'i mig can no //
analyzed: rnam rgyas mig ni rnam par gnas par gyur pa'i mig can no //
translated: ‚ÄúThe expanded eye‚Äù is the eye that has opened.

original: mnyam par ma bzhag kyang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mnyam par ma bzhag kyang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Even when not in equipoise means

original: mnyam par bzhag tu zin kyang mnyam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: mnyam par bzhag tu zin kyang mnyam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: even when not in equipoise, one is in equipoise.

original: de ni tshig dang ldan yang brjod bral yin no //
analyzed: de ni tshig dang ldan yang brjod bral yin no //
translated: That is endowed with words, yet is beyond expression.

original: de ni gzugs ngan par gyur kyang longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni gzugs ngan par gyur kyang longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: That is of ugly form, yet is endowed with great wealth.

original: gzhan gyi bran du gyur pa yin yang 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon po yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi bran du gyur pa yin yang 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon po yin no //
translated: That is a servant of others, yet is the protector of the world.

original: gang zhig de nyid rig ces bya ba ni skad cig ma bzhi pa shes pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig de nyid rig ces bya ba ni skad cig ma bzhi pa shes pa'o //
translated: One who knows reality is the knowledge of the fourth moment.

original: da ni rnal 'byor pa'i don de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i sbyor ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni rnal 'byor pa'i don de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i sbyor ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the yoga of clarifying that reality for the yogi,

original: man ngag thob pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: man ngag thob pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, ‚Äúhaving obtained the intimate instruction,‚Äù and so on.

original: rnam gnyis ni rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: rnam gnyis ni rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: The two means the two aspects.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni man ngag bstan pa'i rjes thogs su'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni man ngag bstan pa'i rjes thogs su'o //
translated: Then, after the intimate instruction is taught,

original: bslab ces bya ba ni goms par bya ba'o //
analyzed: bslab ces bya ba ni goms par bya ba'o //
translated: train means become familiar.

original: ril por 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ril por 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With regard to apprehending the whole, and so on,

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni de ltar rjes su gzhig par bya ba nyid de /
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni de ltar rjes su gzhig par bya ba nyid de /
translated: Thus means in that way, that is, by the analysis of the atoms.

original: rdul phra rab kyi dbye ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rdul phra rab kyi dbye ba nyid kyis so //
translated: By the analysis of the atoms themselves.

original: mgo bo nas ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mgo bo nas brtsams nas rkang pa'i bar du dang rkang pa nas brtsams nas ni ji srid snying gar zhes bya ba'i snying ga'i sa bon la'o //
analyzed: mgo bo nas ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mgo bo nas brtsams nas rkang pa'i bar du dang rkang pa nas brtsams nas ni ji srid snying gar zhes bya ba'i snying ga'i sa bon la'o //
translated: From the head and so on means beginning from the head down to the feet, and beginning from the feet up to the heart, that is, to the seed in the heart.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid la 'jug pa'o //
translated: The limit of reality means the entry into emptiness.

original: 'dir bsdus pa'i don ni 'di yin te rim gyi rim gyis yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'jug par bya ste //
analyzed: 'dir bsdus pa'i don ni 'di yin te rim gyi rim gyis yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'jug par bya ste //
translated: The condensed meaning here is as follows: One should enter into the limit of reality gradually,

original: sa bon gyi mthar thug par zhugs la /
analyzed: sa bon gyi mthar thug par zhugs la /
translated: entering into the final seed,

original: sa bon yang thig ler ro //
analyzed: sa bon yang thig ler ro //
translated: and the seed into the drop,üîΩand that into emptiness.

original: de yang stong pa nyid du'o zhes bya ba 'di lta bu ni ril por 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: de yang stong pa nyid du'o zhes bya ba 'di lta bu ni ril por 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: This is the samadhi of grasping the whole.

original: rgyu ba dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten no //
analyzed: rgyu ba dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten no //
translated: The moving and so on refers to the world of the environment and the beings in it.

original: dang por zhes bya ba ni thog ma nyid du'o //
analyzed: dang por zhes bya ba ni thog ma nyid du'o //
translated: First means at the very beginning.

original: phyi nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes thogs su ste /
analyzed: phyi nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes thogs su ste /
translated: Afterwards means immediately after that.

original: ril por 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can gyi'o //
analyzed: ril por 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can gyi'o //
translated: It is of the nature of the apprehension of the whole.

original: da ni bstan ma thag pa'i rnam pa gnyis po mdor bsdus nas 'od gsal du 'jug pa'i tshul bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni bstan ma thag pa'i rnam pa gnyis po mdor bsdus nas 'od gsal du 'jug pa'i tshul bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the method of entering into clear light by condensing the two aspects just taught,

original: dbugs kyi rlung ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: dbugs kyi rlung ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: he says, the wind of the breath, etc.

original: me long la zhes bya ba ni kha rlangs kyi gzugs so //
analyzed: me long la zhes bya ba ni kha rlangs kyi gzugs so //
translated: In a mirror means in the form of breath.

original: ji ltar kun du thim pa'i ni kun la khyab pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar kun du thim pa'i ni kun la khyab pa'o //
translated: As it dissolves means as it pervades everywhere.

original: de ltar zhes bya @185b ba ni de ltar ro //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya @185b ba ni de ltar ro //
translated: Thus means in that way.

original: yang dang yang zhes bya ba ni skad cig skad cig la goms par byed pa'o //
analyzed: yang dang yang zhes bya ba ni skad cig skad cig la goms par byed pa'o //
translated: Again and again means cultivating it moment by moment.

original: 'gro dang 'dug dang zhes bya ba la sogs par yang slob par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro dang 'dug dang zhes bya ba la sogs par yang slob par byed pa'o //
translated: One should train in going, staying, etc.

original: rtag tu gnas zhes bya ba ni gnas pa nyid do //
analyzed: rtag tu gnas zhes bya ba ni gnas pa nyid do //
translated: Always abiding means remaining in that state.

original: sems can don du'ang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
analyzed: sems can don du'ang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
translated: For the sake of sentient beings, etc.

original: lan 'ga' 'byed par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: lan 'ga' 'byed par 'dod pa'o //
translated: means wishing to open it up from time to time.

original: de dang de zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang de zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that means the nature of clear light.

original: yan na rnam shes rlung dang ldan pa'i zhes bya bas kyang ngo //
analyzed: yan na rnam shes rlung dang ldan pa'i zhes bya bas kyang ngo //
translated: And with consciousness and wind also.

original: gal te 'od gsal ba tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin 'dis sangs rgyas par gyur nas kyang sems can gyi don ji ltar byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te 'od gsal ba tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin 'dis sangs rgyas par gyur nas kyang sems can gyi don ji ltar byed par 'gyur te /
translated: If one becomes a Buddha by this concentration of mere clear light, how will one act for the sake of sentient beings?

original: gzugs kyi sku med par ni sems can gyi don yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: gzugs kyi sku med par ni sems can gyi don yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//
translated: Because there is no benefit for sentient beings without a form body.

original: zhe na / de'i phyir /
analyzed: zhe na / de'i phyir /
translated: Therefore,

original: ji ltar dang ba'i chu klung las //
analyzed: ji ltar dang ba'i chu klung las //
translated: just as from a clear river

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: and so on.

original: nya dag myur bar ldang ba ltar thams cad stong pa las kyang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: nya dag myur bar ldang ba ltar thams cad stong pa las kyang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: Just as fish quickly rise up from a clear river, so it is also from the emptiness of everything.

original: sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rnam pas so //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'i rnam pas so //
translated: The magical net is the mandala circle and so forth.

original: 'byung bar bshad ces bya ba ni bstan pa 'jug par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'byung bar bshad ces bya ba ni bstan pa 'jug par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is said to arise means that the teaching will be engaged.

original: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to clarify just that,

original: rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: The five buddha families and so forth are mentioned.

original: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni lha la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni lha la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: The great seal is the conceptualization of the deity and so forth.

original: 'byung ba'i zhes bya ba ni kun nas 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: 'byung ba'i zhes bya ba ni kun nas 'byung ba ste /
translated: The emergence is the arising.

original: nam mkha' la brgya byin gyi gzhu 'byung ba ji lta bu'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' la brgya byin gyi gzhu 'byung ba ji lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the arising of Indra's bow in the sky.

original: da ni spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the conduct, he says:üîΩWhether binding the seals,

original: phyag rgya 'ching bar byed pa'am //üîΩzhes bya ba smras te /üîΩphyag rgya ma bcings pa 'am yang na bcings par byed pa na'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'ching bar byed pa'am // zhes bya ba smras te / phyag rgya ma bcings pa 'am yang na bcings par byed pa na'o //
translated: or not binding the seals,üîΩwhatever one wishes to do, one should do it all with the mind of emptiness.üîΩWhatever one wishes to do, one should do it all with the mind of emptiness.

original: gang gzhan thams cad ces bya ba gang cung zhig byed par 'dod pa de dag thams cad thams cad stong pa'i gzhi la zhes bya ba stong pa nyid la gnas pas so //üîΩthams cad za zhes bya ba ni bza' ba dang mi za ba kun za ba'o //
analyzed: gang gzhan thams cad ces bya ba gang cung zhig byed par 'dod pa de dag thams cad thams cad stong pa'i gzhi la zhes bya ba stong pa nyid la gnas pas so // thams cad za zhes bya ba ni bza' ba dang mi za ba kun za ba'o //
translated: Whatever one wishes to do, one should do it all with the mind of emptiness.üîΩWhatever one wishes to do, one should do it all with the mind of emptiness.üîΩWhatever one wishes to do, one should do it all with the mind of emptiness.üîΩWhatever one wishes to do, one should do it all with the mind of emptiness.üîΩWhatever one wishes to do, one should do it all with the mind of emptiness.üîΩWhatever one wishes to do, one should do it all with the mind of emptiness.üîΩWhatever one wishes to do, one should do it all with the mind of emptiness.üîΩWhatever one wishes to do, one should do it all with the mind of emptiness.üîΩWhatever one wishes to do, one should do it all with the mind of emptiness.üîΩWhatever one wishes to do, one should do it all with the mind of emptiness.üîΩWhatever one wishes to do, one should do it all with the mind of emptiness.üîΩWhatever one wishes to do, one should do it all with the mind of emptiness.üîΩWhatever one wishes to do, one should do it all with the mind of emptiness.üîΩWhatever one wishes to do, one should do it all with the mind of emptiness.üîΩWhatever one wishes to do, one should do it all with the mind of emptiness.üîΩWhatever one wishes to do, one should do it all with the mind of emptiness.üîΩWhatever one wishes to do, one should do it all with the mind of emptiness.

original: kun la phyag byed ces bya ba ni thams cad la phyag 'chal ba'o //
analyzed: kun la phyag byed ces bya ba ni thams cad la phyag 'chal ba'o //
translated: Whatever one wishes to do, one should do it all with the mind of emptiness.üîΩWhatever one wishes

original: kun du 'gro zhes bya ba ni bgrod par bya ba dang bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa'i mi spyod pa'o //
analyzed: kun du 'gro zhes bya ba ni bgrod par bya ba dang bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa'i mi spyod pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúUniversal‚Äù means that he does not practice what should and should not be practiced.

original: thams cad byed ces bya ba ni bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad byed ces bya ba ni bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAll‚Äù means merit and demerit.

original: rtags kun 'chang zhes bya ba ni bdag dang gzhan gyi lta ba can gyi rtags kun 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: rtags kun 'chang zhes bya ba ni bdag dang gzhan gyi lta ba can gyi rtags kun 'chang ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBearing all signs‚Äù means bearing the signs of the views of self and others.

original: 'di ltar gnas par gyur pa'i rnam par dag par yang slob par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar gnas par gyur pa'i rnam par dag par yang slob par byed pa'o //
translated: Thus, he trains in the purification of the state of being.

original: rtag tu gnas zhes bya ba ni gnas pa nyid do/ so //
analyzed: rtag tu gnas zhes bya ba ni gnas pa nyid do/ so //
translated: ‚ÄúAlways abiding‚Äù means abiding in the state of being.

original: man ngag thob pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la spyod pa'i dus su gnang ba thob nas yang byang chub kyi sems blang ba'i tshigs su bcad pa las skal bzangs zhes bya ba ni skal ba dang ldan @186a * //
analyzed: man ngag thob pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la spyod pa'i dus su gnang ba thob nas yang byang chub kyi sems blang ba'i tshigs su bcad pa las skal bzangs zhes bya ba ni skal ba dang ldan @186a * //
translated: Having obtained the permission at the time of practice, he again takes up the Thought of Enlightenment. The verse on taking up the Thought of Enlightenment says, ‚ÄúFortunate one,‚Äù i.e., one who is endowed with good fortune.

original: pa'o ; / byang chub sems zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: pa'o ; / byang chub sems zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: ‚ÄúThought of Enlightenment‚Äù is the ultimate Thought of Enlightenment.

original: slar yang zhes bya ba ni spyod pa byed pa'i dus so //
analyzed: slar yang zhes bya ba ni spyod pa byed pa'i dus so //
translated: ‚ÄúAgain‚Äù is at the time of practicing the career.

original: khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa zhig ce na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa zhig ce na /
translated: What kind of special qualities does it have?

original: dngos po kun dang rnam bral zhing //üîΩzhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: dngos po kun dang rnam bral zhing // zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: It is free from all things

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and is equal to space.

original: rnam par spangs pa'i ni phung po la sogs pa'i ngo bo dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par spangs pa'i ni phung po la sogs pa'i ngo bo dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is free from the nature of the aggregates and so forth.

original: chos bdag med pa dang zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste de dang mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: chos bdag med pa dang zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste de dang mnyam pa'o //
translated: It is equal to the selflessness of phenomena, which is essencelessness.

original: rang sems nyid ni byang chub kyi sems so //üîΩci ste yod dam zhe na /
analyzed: rang sems nyid ni byang chub kyi sems so // ci ste yod dam zhe na /
translated: One's own mind is the mind of enlightenment.

original: gzod ma nas ma skyes pa zhes bya ba smras so //
analyzed: gzod ma nas ma skyes pa zhes bya ba smras so //
translated: If it exists, why is it said to be primordially unborn?

original: de nas rjes su mthun pa'i yon //
analyzed: de nas rjes su mthun pa'i yon //
translated: Then, with the appropriate gift

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bla ma la yon dbul ba bstan te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bla ma la yon dbul ba bstan te /
translated: and so forth, the offering to the guru is taught.

original: rjes su mthun pa ni rang gi rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su mthun pa ni rang gi rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: The appropriate is appropriate to oneself.

original: bu mo ni bu mo nyid do //
analyzed: bu mo ni bu mo nyid do //
translated: A girl is a girl herself.

original: lhag ma rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba ni mi sbyin pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba ni mi sbyin pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: What need is there to mention the rest? There is no non-giving.

original: slob dpon las ni drin thob ces bya ba ni spyod pa byed pa'i dus su'o //
analyzed: slob dpon las ni drin thob ces bya ba ni spyod pa byed pa'i dus su'o //
translated: The line the master is the one from whom one receives kindness refers to the time of engaging in the conduct.

original: gang la dri ma med cing bstan pa'i blo ste mi g-yo ba gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang la dri ma med cing bstan pa'i blo ste mi g-yo ba gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The line the one who has an unmoving mind that is stainless and taught refers to the time of the result.

original: 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir dngos kun ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir dngos kun ngo bo nyid do //
translated: The line the nature of all entities is luminosity refers to the nature of the result.

original: gsal ba ni dri ma med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba ni dri ma med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The line clarity refers to the result's being stainless.

original: dag pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dag pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The line purity refers to the result's being the nature of the purification of desire and so on.

original: shin tu phra ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i spyod yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu phra ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i spyod yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The line extremely subtle refers to the result's being the domain of the yoga of self-consecration.

original: mchog gi rang bzhin ni 'gro ba'i mngon par mtho ba dang / nges par legs pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog gi rang bzhin ni 'gro ba'i mngon par mtho ba dang / nges par legs pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The line supreme refers to the result's being the cause of the higher realms and definite goodness for transmigrating beings.

original: sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das pa'i khams ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das pa'i khams ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The line the realm of the buddhas' nirvƒÅ·πáa refers to the result's being the nature of the buddhas' dharmakƒÅya.

original: gnyis med ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis med ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Non-dual because it abandons the two extremes of entity and non-entity.

original: rtog bral ni rnam par rtog pa las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog bral ni rnam par rtog pa las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Free from conceptualization because it transcends conceptualization.

original: rtag tu bde ba'i rang bzhin ni rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bde ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rtag tu bde ba'i rang bzhin ni rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bde ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Always blissful because it is the nature of uninterrupted bliss.

original: 'di lta bu'i 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on it because it is the nature of such clear light.

original: de nyid rnal 'byor pas zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid rnal 'byor pas zhes bya ba ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'o //
translated: The yogi/nƒ´ of that, means one who has attained the samƒÅdhi of self-consecration.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bsod nams min las grol zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bsod nams min las grol zhes bya'o //
translated: For that very reason, it is said, freed from non-merit.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One becomes Vajrasattva means one becomes Vajrasattva.

original: mchog tu gsang ba'i mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'i dka' 'grel lo /
analyzed: mchog tu gsang ba'i mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'i dka' 'grel lo /
translated: The commentary on the stage of manifest enlightenment, the supreme secret.

original: // / dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin gtso dang // klu sgrub bla ma la gus pas //
analyzed: // / dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin gtso dang // klu sgrub bla ma la gus pas //
translated: With devotion to the glorious VajrapƒÅ·πái and NƒÅgƒÅrjuna, the guru,

original: phyag 'tshal nas ni zung 'jug pa'i //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal nas ni zung 'jug pa'i //
translated: Having bowed down,üîΩ

original: dka' 'grel cung zhig bri bar bya //
analyzed: dka' 'grel cung zhig bri bar bya //
translated: Having paid homage, I will write a brief commentary on the union.

original: @186b mgon po rgyu dang 'bras bdag nyid //
analyzed: @186b mgon po rgyu dang 'bras bdag nyid //
translated: The lord is the nature of cause and effect,

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: and so on. The characteristic of the non-duality of the two truths, conventional and ultimate, is stated.

original: chad pa dang rtag pa'i mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i phyir gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'o //
analyzed: chad pa dang rtag pa'i mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i phyir gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'o //
translated: Since it abandons the two extremes of annihilation and permanence, it is the complete abandonment of duality.

original: yang dag ces bya ba ni don ji lta ba'o //
analyzed: yang dag ces bya ba ni don ji lta ba'o //
translated: The word real is as it is in fact.

original: zung zhes bya ba ni zung du gzhibs pa ste /
analyzed: zung zhes bya ba ni zung du gzhibs pa ste /
translated: The word union is the union of two things.

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang / rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang / kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang / rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang / kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Existence and non-existence, permanence and impermanence, conventional and ultimate truth, and so on.

original: 'jug ces bya ba ni ro gcig par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug ces bya ba ni ro gcig par gyur pa'o //
translated: The word engaged is the state of becoming one taste.

original: de'i rim pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir mchog go //
analyzed: de'i rim pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir mchog go //
translated: Its stage is supreme because it is the nature of abiding in the completion stage, the nature of Great Vajradhara.

original: 'khor ba dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'khor ba dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In samsara, etc.

original: gcig gyur pa ni ro gcig par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gcig gyur pa ni ro gcig par gyur pa'o //
translated: One taste is the same taste.

original: gang du zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang ngo //
analyzed: gang du zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang ngo //
translated: Where means the state of Vajradhara.

original: kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba ni gti mug dang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i 'ching ba'o //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba ni gti mug dang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i 'ching ba'o //
translated: Afflicted means the bonds of delusion, desire, etc.

original: rnam par byang ba ni thar pa ste gang gi don dam pa nyid shes pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par byang ba ni thar pa ste gang gi don dam pa nyid shes pa'o //
translated: Purification is liberation, which is the knowledge of the ultimate.

original: rnam bcas zhes pa ni gang rnam pa dang ldan zhing 'jug par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rnam bcas zhes pa ni gang rnam pa dang ldan zhing 'jug par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: With aspects means that which has aspects and engages.

original: rnam med ces bya ba ni gang la rnam pa yod pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: rnam med ces bya ba ni gang la rnam pa yod pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: Without aspects means that which does not have aspects.

original: rtog pa gnyis po de dag spangs pa nyid do //
analyzed: rtog pa gnyis po de dag spangs pa nyid do //
translated: Those two conceptions are abandoned.

original: gzugs dang ni zhes pa la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gzugs dang ni zhes pa la sogs pa la /
translated: In form, etc.

original: yod min zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o //
analyzed: yod min zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o //
translated: Not existing means ultimately.

original: gang du zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gang du'o //
analyzed: gang du zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gang du'o //
translated: Where means in which meditative stabilization.

original: spangs nas zhes bya ba ni yongs su btang ba'o //
analyzed: spangs nas zhes bya ba ni yongs su btang ba'o //
translated: Having abandoned means having relinquished.
